112331.title: grow

115.content:
“Ax?” said Axew curiously as he picked up the remote. He’d seen remotes before, but none as complicated as this, and he had no idea what it was doing on the side of the road. Axew decided to press one of the buttons, to see if the remote did anything.

What happened with to Axew?
115.title: Axew found the remote.

1151.content: What does Axew evolve into?
1151.title: Axew began to evolve.

choices: Iris is surprised to see Axew has evolved.
Iris is unaware of Axew's evolution.
11512.content:
After pressing the button, Axew’s body began to glow white. He grew nearly four feet taller, and his tusks grew, forming an axe-like blade on either side of his head. His scales grew tougher, forming dark yellow-green armoured ridges along his back, and his tail grew in length as well. Red claws formed on his hands and feet, and the scales on his belly and the inside of his legs turned black.

“Haxorus?!” Axew said in surprise, looking himself over. He couldn’t believe it. That remote had made him evolve into Haxorus, without first evolving into Fraxure! What else was the remote capable of?

Iris, having heard Axew call out, turned to look at her Pokémon. How does Iris react?
11512.title: Axew evolves into Haxorus.

choices: Haxorus and Iris catch up to Ash and Cilan.
A trainer challenges Iris to battle!
115122.content:
Iris, having heard Axew call out, turned to look at her Pokémon. How does Iris react?

“Hey, Haxorus, what’s wrong?” Iris said, walking over to Axew, now Haxorus, who was still getting used to his new body.

“Hax, Haxor,” Haxorus said.

Iris reached up a hand up, and scratched Haxorus on the chin. He hummed softly and lowered his head, allowing Iris reach better. She began rubbing the underside of his chin, and Haxorus closed his eyes as he smiled.

“That better?” Iris asked.

“Hax!” Haxorus said happily.

“That’s good,” said Iris. “Now, hold still.”

Iris walked over to Haxorus’ side, and grabbed onto his arm. She pulled herself up, bracing her feet on his leg. She reached over to one of the ridges on his back, and Haxorus moved his arm so she could use it to brace her feet. Iris climbed onto Haxorus’ back, sitting between two of the ridges on his back.

“Thanks,” she said. “Now, come on. We need to catch up to the others.”

“Haxor!” said Haxorus, nodding. Iris wrapped her arms around his neck as Haxorus began to walk, slowly picking up speed until he reached a light jog. As he ran, Haxorus looked down at the remote in his claws. Iris was completely unaware of his evolution into Haxorus.

This remote is more powerful than I thought, Haxorus thought.

What happened next?
115122.title: Iris is unaware of Axew's evolution.

1151222.content: Who appeared to challenge Iris to battle?
1151222.title: A trainer challenges Iris to battle!

choices: Georgia and her Beartic win the battle.
11512221.content:
“Well, look who it is,” said a voice from behind Iris and Haxorus.

“Huh?” said Iris, and Haxorus turned around to face the person who had spoken, and Iris peeked over his shoulder. Standing on the side of the road was a girl with dark pink hair and blue eyes, dressed in all green and wearing a yellow hat.

“Georgia?!” said Iris. “What are you doing here?”

“Isn’t it obvious?” said Georgia, pulling a Pokéball out of her pocket and tossing it up and down. “I want a proper battle with you! Dragon Buster versus Dragon Master! And make sure your Dragon-type Pokémon listen to you this time!”

“You still mad about how my Dragonite beat you at the World Tournament Junior Cup?” Iris asked smugly.

“Well, you can’t call yourself a Dragon Master if your Pokémon don’t listen to you,” Georgia said smugly. “First Excadrill, then Dragonite. I wouldn’t be surprised if your Axew stopped listening to you when he evolved into Haxorus, either.”

“Haxorus, Hax!” Haxorus said, gritting his teeth.

“Why, you--!” Iris said angrily. Iris stood up and jumped off Haxorus’ back, landing behind him. “Haxorus, we’re gonna teach her a lesson for that!”

“Hax!” said Haxorus, nodding.

“Well, looks like this might be a challenge after all,” said Georgia. “Beartic, let’s go!”

Georgia tossed her Pokéball into the air, and in a flash of white light, Georgia’s Beartic emerged from his Pokéball.

“Beartic!” Georgia’s Beartic roared, baring his claws.

“Hey, Iris!” a voice called. Iris looked over her shoulder to see Ash, Cilan and Pikachu running towards her.

“We got worried when we realised we’d gone on without you,” Ash said as he reached her.

“Pika, Pika!” said Ash’s Pikachu.

“Don’t worry, I’m fine,” said Iris. “Georgia, on the other hand, is headed for a loss.”

“Pfft, as if,” said Georgia. “There’s no way I’d lose to you.”

“Only one way to find out,” said Iris. “Ready, Haxorus?”

“Haxor!” said Haxorus.

Ash and Pikachu stood off to the side, behind Iris, while Cilan took up a position between where Haxorus and Beartic were squaring off, so he could referee the battle. Once he was in place, Cilan raised a hand.

“Battle begin!” Cilan said.

Who wins the battle?
11512221.title: Georgia, Iris' rival.

choices: Georgia was fused with her Beartic.
115122211.content:
“Let’s go! Beartic, use Ice Beam!” Georgia ordered, pointing at Haxorus.

“Bear!” Beartic roared, opening his mouth as icy energy began to form in front of his mouth, then a light blue beam of ice energy blasted out towards Haxorus.

“Haxorus, block it with Dragon Pulse!” said Iris.

“Hax!” said Haxorus. He opened his mouth wide, and a multi-coloured beam of dragon energy shot out. Haxorus’ Dragon Pulse hit Beartic’s Ice Beam, and the two beams of energy pushed against each other for a few seconds, before exploding, sending dust and soot into the air around them. When the dust cleared, neither Pokémon seemed to have taken much damage.

“Okay, Beartic, now use Focus Blast!” said Georgia.

“Bear!” growled Beartic, holding his hands in front of him and charging a light blue energy ball between his hands. He thrust his hands forward, launching the Focus Blast at Haxorus.

“Cut through it with Slash, Haxorus!” Iris yelled.

“Haxor!” said Haxorus, as his axe-like tusks began to glow white. He ran forward, and swung his head at the Focus Blast orb, slicing through it with one of his tusks. Georgia and Beartic watched in shock as he sliced through the Focus Blast orb then continued forward. Once he reached Beartic, he swung his head again, using his tusks to Slash at Beartic’s chest. Beartic staggered back from the blow, and growled angrily.

“This is not looking good,” said Georgia. “Okay, Beartic, try Hidden Power!”

“Beartic!” said Beartic. Green orbs of energy formed around Beartic, and he flung them at Haxorus.

“Haxorus, use Outrage!” Iris said.

“Haxorus!” Haxorus roared, as his eyes glowed red. A red aura formed around him, and he charged forward. The green Hidden Power orbs struck Haxorus as he ran, but they simply bounced off, repelled by the red aura surrounding him. Haxorus lashed out with his claws, striking Beartic. He then swung his head, hitting Beartic with his axe-like tusks. Haxorus swung his head again, in a downwards motion, but Beartic dodged the blow, and the red aura surrounding Haxorus faded, though his eyes still glowed red. Haxorus’ swing missed Beartic, and he hit the ground, causing one of his tusks to get stuck in the ground.

“Alright! Now, while he’s confused, hit him with Blizzard!” said Georgia.

“Bear!” said Beartic, taking a deep breath and forming a light blue orb of ice energy in front of his open mouth.

“Ah! Haxorus, look out!” said Iris, as Haxorus struggled to pull his tusk out of the dirt.

“Tic!” Beartic roared as he exhaled. A powerful gust of wind, carrying ice and snow, shot out from the orb in front of Beartic’s mouth as he exhaled, and the Blizzard shot towards Haxorus. The red glow in Haxorus’ eyes faded, and he pulled his tusk out of the ground and leapt to one side, causing the Blizzard to fly past him harmlessly.

“Ah!” Georgia gasped. “He dodged it!”

“Yeah, go Haxorus!” said Iris.

“Hax!”

“Now, let’s finish this!” said Iris. “Haxorus, use Giga Impact!”

“Haxorus!” said Haxorus, as he was surrounded by a yellow aura. He charged at Beartic, and as he ran, an orb of light purple energy formed around him, engulfing him.

“Beartic, look out!” said Georgia.

Beartic tried to avoid Haxorus, but Haxorus was going too fast for Beartic to dodge.

“Haxorus!” Haxorus cried as he slammed into Beartic. There was an explosion as the purple orb surrounding Haxorus detonated, causing both Pokemon to be obscured by smoke. As the smoke cleared, both Haxorus and Beartic were standing facing each other, though they were both swaying on their feet. Haxorus staggered forward a step, but managed to recover and straighten himself up. Beartic, on the other hand, fell backwards, and hit the ground with a loud thump.

“Bear...” Beartic moaned.

“Beartic is unable to battle!” said Cilan, holding up a hand. “Haxorus wins!”

“Haha! Yes! We did it, Haxorus!” said Iris, smiling and laughing as she jumped up and hugged Haxorus’ neck.

“Hax, Haxorus,” said Haxorus, smiling.

“I... I don’t believe it...” said Georgia quietly. “I... I lost...”

As Iris hugged Haxorus, he remembered that he still had the remote, tucked safely away under some of his scales. He pulled the remote out, and pointed it at Georgia. She was kneeling next to her Beartic and helping him to sit up. While Georgia was distracted, Haxorus aimed the remote at Georgia and pressed a button.

What happened to Georgia?
115122211.title: Iris and Haxorus claim victory.

1151222111.content: What was swapped between Haxorus and Georgia?
1151222111.title: Haxorus and Georgia swapped something.

choices: Body-Swap, But They Keep Their Own Lives
They Only Think That Their Bodies Have Been Swapped
11512221111.content:
What kind of body-swap are we talking about here?

Is it the 'traditional' body-swap, with both of them suddenly being in each other's bodies, with no other weird stuff happening?

Or is it the lesser known version; wherein Haxorus and Georgia gets each other's bodies, but keep their own lives?

Or perhaps it gets a little weirder, in the sense that they don't swap bodies at all, but it causes both Georgia and Haxorus to think that they HAVE swapped; i.e. they both think that Georgia's human body is really Haxorus' Pokémon body and that Haxorus' Pokémon body is really Georgia's human body?
11512221111.title: Haxorus and Georgia swapped bodies.

11512221112.content:
Haxorus blinked in surprise. He was no longer standing next to Iris, and was now kneeling next to Georgia’s Beartic. He looked down at himself, and saw that he was wearing the clothes that Georgia had been wearing, except that they were now designed to be worn by a Haxorus, rather than by a human. He looked up, and saw Georgia standing next to Iris. Georgia was no longer wearing any clothes, and Iris was hugging her and laughing.

“You were great, Haxorus,” said Iris. “Good job!”

“Hax, Haxorus,” said Georgia, blushing bashfully.

“Whoa,” said Haxorus, then gasped in surprise. He was speaking like a human!

Next to him, Beartic groaned, and Haxorus hastily put the remote in one of his pockets.

“Hey, you did great, Beartic,” said Haxorus as he pulled out a Pokéball. “Get some rest.”

A red beam of light emerged from the Pokéball and connected with Beartic. As the red light faded, it pulled Beartic back into his Pokéball, and Haxorus put the Pokéball in his pocket, and stood up as Iris walked up to him.

“Hey, Georgia,” said Iris, holding out a hand. “That was a good battle. Thanks.”

“Y-yeah, you too,” Haxorus said, hesitantly taking Iris’ hand. He shook hands with her, and Iris didn’t seem to find anything strange about it.

“So, how long are you gonna hang around for?” Iris asked.

“Uh, well...” said Haxorus.

“Because if you’re gonna sulk about how Haxorus and I beat you, do it somewhere else,” Iris continued.

“Hax!” said Georgia, nodding firmly.

Haxorus was stunned. The remote had caused everyone to think he was Georgia, and that Georgia was him! Not only that, but not even Georgia realised anything was wrong with this situation! The only problem, at least in Haxorus’ eyes, was that Iris no longer considered him a friend, since he was now Georgia, and Georgia was Iris’ rival. Haxorus’ hand started to reach for his pocket. Maybe he could use the remote to fix this...
11512221112.title: Haxorus and Georgia swapped lives.

choices: The remote made Haxorus and Iris best friends.
115122211121.content:
As Iris turned and walked back towards Georgia, Haxorus quickly pulled the remote out, and pointed it at Iris. Hoping that the remote could do something to make Iris more friendly towards him, he pressed a random button.

What happened?
115122211121.title: Haxorus uses the remote.

1151222111211.content:
There was no obvious changes this time, so Haxorus quickly put the remote in his pocket as Iris turned back towards him.

“Hey, Georgia, you want to stay with us for the night?” Iris asked.

“Huh? Why?” said Haxorus, confused.

“Because you’re my best friend, duh,” said Iris. “Besides, it’s getting late, and you probably don’t want to be alone at night.”

“That’s a good point,” Haxorus said sheepishly. “Yeah, I think I’ll stay with you guys for the night.”

“Great!” said Iris. “Hey, Cilan, remember to make enough for Georgia when we stop for the day.”

“No need to remind me,” said Cilan. “I remember just how much you ate when we first met.”

“Hey, in my defence, the food was really good,” said Haxorus.

“It must’ve been, since you ate enough for three people,” said Ash.

“Pika Pi,” said Pikachu.

“So, do we want to set up camp now, or push on until dark?” Cilan asked.

“I say we set up camp,” said Ash. “By the time we’re all set up and ready to eat, it’ll be almost dark anyway.”

“Yeah, I’m with Ash,” said Iris. “How about you, Georgia?”

“I’ll go with whatever you guys decide,” said Haxorus.

“Great!” said Iris. “Then let’s set up camp. I think I saw a good spot to make camp over here.”

Iris led the group to a small clearing, just inside the woods on the side of the dirt path, with enough room for Cilan to set up his table and food, as well as space for them to set up their sleeping bags. Iris hung up her hammock between two trees, and Ash and Haxorus rolled out their sleeping bags while Cilan set up his table and started cooking.
1151222111211.title: The remote made Haxorus and Iris best friends.

choices: Use the remote on someone else.
11512221112111.content:
Once the campsite had been set up, Ash, Iris, Cilan and Haxorus had sat down to a delicious meal, cooked by Cilan. By the time they’d finished eating, the sun had begun to set, so Ash had helped Cilan clean the dishes, then the four of them had settled in for the night.

Haxorus was still getting used to living in Georgia’s life. He’d discovered that all of Georgia’s clothes were now shaped to fit his body, including her sleepwear. Even her sleeping bag was the right size for him. As he settled in for the night, he looked around. Ash was sleeping a few feet away, with his Pikachu curled up on his chest. Cilan was sleeping a short distance away from him, and Iris was in her hammock, strung up between two trees. Georgia, thinking she was Iris’ Haxorus, was sleeping on the ground below Iris.

Laying in his sleeping bag, Haxorus suddenly felt the urge to use the remote again. He reached towards his bag and pulled the remote out. But who was he going to use the remote on?
11512221112111.title: That night...

choices: Haxorus swapped something with someone else instead.
115122211121112.content:
Haxorus shifted slightly, so that he could point the remote at Georgia. He had already swapped lives with her, but what if he also swapped bodies with her? That way, not only would everyone think he was Georgia, he’d physically be Georgia as well, and Georgia would be Haxorus in both life and in body.

Haxorus pressed one of the buttons near the button that had swapped his and Georgia’s lives, and hoped that he’d picked the right one.
115122211121112.title: Use the remote on Georgia.

choices: Go to sleep, and continue tomorrow morning.
1151222111211121.content:
The first thing Haxorus noticed was that he felt shorter. He put the remote down and looked at his hands. By the moonlight, Haxorus could see that he new had five fingers on his hands, rather than three. He raised one of his hands to his head, and he felt hair between his fingers. He also had a rather strange feeling between his legs, which was probably because he had a female body now.

Haxorus looked up from his self-examination, and looked over at where Georgia was sleeping. There was now a large yellow-green dragon with large, axe-like tusks, sleeping on the ground where Georgia had been. Georgia the Haxorus rolled over, and Haxorus had to resist the urge to laugh. He’d done it! He was now fully human! The remote had allowed him to swap lives and bodies with Georgia, and it had even made him and Iris best friends, so he didn’t have to worry about losing his old Trainer’s friendship.

Haxorus picked the remote up again. He could continue to use the remote, or he could put the remote away and get some sleep. What did he decide to do?
1151222111211121.title: Haxorus swapped bodies with Georgia.

choices: Ash, Iris, Cilan and Haxorus make it to the Pokémon Centre.
11512221112111212.content:
Haxorus yawned suddenly, and decided it was too late to be using the remote. He could always use it again in the morning. Haxorus stuffed the remote into the bottom of his bag, then rolled over and went to sleep.



When Haxorus woke up the next morning, he felt strange, and couldn’t figure out why. He opened his eyes and sat up, looking himself over. He must’ve been still dreaming, because he had a human body. That was when he remembered the remote. He quickly checked his bag, and found the remote right where he left it. Haxorus sighed in relief. There was no telling what might happen if he lost the remote.

Haxorus put the remote back in his bag, then looked around. Ash, Pikachu, Iris, Georgia and Cilan were also awake, and Haxorus could smell food cooking as Cilan made breakfast. Haxorus climbed out of his sleeping bag and gathered up his clothes so he could change in private. As he got changed, he noticed that Georgia’s clothes had changed size again. When he had his own body and Georgia’s life, Georgia’s clothes had grown and changed shape to fit his body, but now that he had Georgia’s body as well as her life, her clothes had gone back to being the right size for a human, rather than a Haxorus. After he finished getting changed, he packed up his sleeping bag, which had also changed back to being human sized. Once he’d finished packing up, Haxorus joined the others for breakfast.

“So, where are you guys headed?” Haxorus asked as he sat down for breakfast.

“We’re going to Pallet Town,” said Iris. “Ash invited us to go and visit his mom for a few days. After that, Cilan and I are going to Johto.”

“And I’m going to go to Kalos,” said Ash. “I can’t wait to see what sort of Pokemon they have over there.”

“What about you, Georgia?” Cilan asked. “What are your plans?”

“Uh, well,” said Haxorus, thinking furiously. “I don’t really have any plans at the moment,” he said. “Do you guys mind if I tag along, at least until we get to Pallet Town?”

“Sure,” said Ash. “I’m sure Mom would love to meet you, too.”

“Thanks,” said Haxorus, turning his attention to the food in front of him. As he ate, he tried to think about what Georgia might want to do. That was when he suddenly began to remember that Georgia wanted to get all the Gym Badges in Kanto and win the Indigo Plateau Conference. Georgia had planned to challenge Lance, the Champion of Kanto and Johto, and a Dragon-type specialist, so she could prove that she was the greatest Dragon Buster ever.

Swapping lives with Georgia must have given me her memories as well, thought Haxorus.

The four of them finished breakfast, then helped Cilan clean the dishes and finish packing up. Once everything was packed away, Ash, Iris, Cilan and Haxorus made their way back to the dirt path, and started walking towards Pallet Town.

“So, are we heading straight to Pallet Town?” Haxorus asked.

“Actually, we should probably head to a Pokémon Centre first,” said Iris. “Your Beartic is probably still tired from our battle yesterday.”

“Hax, Haxor,” said Georgia, walking along behind Iris.

“Oh! Right!” Haxorus said, suddenly feeling guilty for forgetting about Georgia’s Pokémon. Since he was now their Trainer, he was now responsible for them as well. “How could I have forgotten about that?”

“Don’t worry, it happens to all of us,” said Ash. “Right, Pikachu?”

“Pika Pika, Pikachu,” said Pikachu, sitting on Ash’s shoulder.

“There should be a Pokémon Centre along this path,” said Cilan, looking at his Town Map. “We’ll stop there for lunch, then continue to Pallet Town.”

“Sounds like a plan!” said Ash.

“Pikachu!”
11512221112111212.title: Go to sleep, and continue tomorrow morning.

115122211121112122.content: What happened on the way to the Pokémon Centre?
115122211121112122.title: Something happens along the way.

1151222111211121222.content: Who did Ash, Iris, Cilan and Haxorus encounter?
1151222111211121222.title: They run into someone.

choices: The group continues to the Pokémon Centre.
Haxorus uses the remote on Officer Jenny.
11512221112111212222.content:
Ash, Iris, Cilan and Haxorus walked along the dirt road, heading south towards Pallet Town. For about an hour, their journey was uneventful, until the quiet of the forest was broken by the sound of a motorcycle engine coming from behind them. The four of them turned, and saw a white motorcycle driving up the dirt path towards them. The motorcycle slowed down to a stop as it came up to them, and Haxorus was able to get a good look at the rider. The rider was a woman with teal hair and amber eyes, wearing a blue shirt with red cuffs on the sleeves, and a matching blue skirt and hat.

“Hey, kids,” the motorcycle rider said. “Staying out of trouble?”

“Of course, Officer Jenny,” said Ash.

This is an Officer Jenny? thought Haxorus. She doesn’t look anything like the Officer Jennies we saw back in Unova.

“Hey, do I know you?” Officer Jenny asked, looking at Ash.

“Are you the Officer Jenny from Viridian City?” Ash asked.

“That’s right,” Officer Jenny said, nodding.

“Yeah, we met when I was just starting out on my journey,” said Ash. “Pikachu had been hurt by a flock of Spearow, and you helped me get to the Pokémon Centre in Viridian City.”

“Pika Pi!” said Pikachu, waving at Officer Jenny.

“That’s right, now I remember,” said Officer Jenny. “Wow, that was such a long time ago.”

“Excuse me,” said Cilan. “But can you tell us where the nearest Pokémon Centre is?”

“Sure, it’s just down that way, about half an hour’s walk,” said Officer Jenny, pointing in the direction of Pallet Town. "You can't miss it."

“Thank you,” said Cilan.
11512221112111212222.title: Officer Jenny.

choices: She became an Officer Jenny from another region.
Haxorus and Officer Jenny swap something.
115122211121112122222.content:
While Officer Jenny was distracted, talking to Ash, Haxorus reached into his bag and pulled out the remote. Interested in seeing what it could do, he pointed the remote at Officer Jenny and pressed a random button.

What happened to Officer Jenny?
115122211121112122222.title: Haxorus uses the remote on Officer Jenny.

1151222111211121222222.content: What does Haxorus end up swapping with Officer Jenny?
1151222111211121222222.title: Haxorus and Officer Jenny swap something.

choices: Officer Jenny and Nurse Joy swapped something.
Officer Jenny and Haxorus are now best friends.

1151222111211121222223.title: Something else happened...

choices: They swap personalities (Sweet Jenny and Stern Joy)
They swap jobs (Nurse Jenny and Officer Joy)
Something else happened to Jenny and Joy

11512221112111212222231.title: Officer Jenny and Nurse Joy swapped something.

choices: They swap bodies (Pink-haired Jenny and Teal-haired Joy).
They swap clothes (Jenny dressed as a Nurse, Joy dressed as an Officer).
Something else happened to Jenny and Joy...

choices: Officer Jenny began acting like a Pokémon.
Officer Jenny began to change size.

choices: Officer Jenny acts like an existing Pokémon.
Officer Jenny is now her own species of Pokémon.
115122211121112122222331.content: Does Officer Jenny start to act like an existing Pokémon, or is she her own species of Pokémon?
115122211121112122222331.title: Officer Jenny began acting like a Pokémon.

choices: A species of Pokémon who is allowed to do everything people can do.
A species of Pokémon to be treated like any other Pokémon.
1151222111211121222223312.content: What kind of Pokémon is Officer Jenny now?
1151222111211121222223312.title: Officer Jenny is now her own species of Pokémon.

choices: Every Officer Jenny is now a Pokémon.
Only this Officer Jenny is a Pokémon.
11512221112111212222233122.content: Is every Officer Jenny affected, or just this one?
11512221112111212222233122.title: A species of Pokémon who is allowed to do ever...

choices: She has a Pokemon Trainer who is somewhere else.
115122211121112122222331221.content: Is this Jenny wild, or does she have a Pokémon Trainer?
115122211121112122222331221.title: Every Officer Jenny is now a Pokémon.

1151222111211121222223312211.content:
Haxorus blinked. The motorcycle Officer Jenny had been riding was now gone, as if it had never existed. Officer Jenny was now standing near the group, and she was now completely naked. She was sitting on the ground, eating a Berry.

“Hey, that Jenny isn't wearing any clothes!” said Ash.

"That means it's probably wild," Noted Cilan.

“That means we can catch it!” said Iris.

A member of the group quickly pulled out an empty Pokéball and threw it at the wild Jenny. The Pokéball hit the wild Jenny and opened, emitting a red beam of light that pulled her into the Pokéball. The Pokéball fell to the ground, where it rocked back and forth once… twice… three times… then dinged, signalling that the wild Jenny had been successfully caught.

Who caught the wild Jenny?
1151222111211121222223312211.title: She's a wild Jenny.

choices: The group continues to the Pokémon Center with Jenny.
A trainer appears to challenge Haxorus' Jenny!
11512221112111212222233122111.content:
Haxorus walked up to the Pokéball and picked it up, then raised it above her head triumphantly.

“Yes! I caught a Jenny!” she said.

“Alright! Great job, Georgia!” said Iris.

“Aw, thanks,” said Haxorus, blushing.

I can’t believe I caught a Pokémon on my first try! Thought Haxorus, That was so fun. No wonder there are so many Pokemon Trainers out there.

Haxorus held the Pokéball out, and sent her new Jenny back out.

Haxorus' Jenny came out of her Pokeball and stood up. “Thanks for catching me, Trainer!” Jenny said, looking at Haxorus. "I can't wait to go on a Pokemon adventure with you!"

Haxorus gasped and asked, "You can talk?!"

"You're such a kid," Iris teased. She turned to Jenny and said, "But you're grown enough to talk, right?"

"I certainly am!" Haxorus' Jenny replied.

Haxorus reached into one of her pockets and pulled out her Pokédex. She opened the Pokédex and scanned Jenny, updating his Pokédex.

“Jenny, the Justice Pokemon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. "Fighting-Type. Due to their innate sense of justice and morality, Jennies despise criminals. As a result, they are often used by police forces around the world. Jennies are also very protective of their family and friends, and will fight rampaging Pokemon to protect them. Jenny can understand and speak human language. Once trained, they are allowed to perform most human jobs.”

"Wow. So they really do let you do everything people do even though you're a Pokemon?" Asked Haxorus. "Wait. What can't you do?"

"Um. I don't know. I know Jennies like me are really good at learning people laws and helping the police, but Mom said I'd learn the stuff I can't do from a Trainer," Haxorus' Jenny admitted.

"Allow me to explain!" Said Cilan. "A Jenny can't train Pokemon because they are one, and they can't take positions that put them in charge of people, like Mayor or Pokemon Professor. Other than that, a finely aged and well-trained Jenny can perform all sorts of human jobs. Many are trained as pets for children, since their near-perfect human anatomy lets them pass as humans and protect children from danger without fear from their parents. Still, assisting the police is by far and away their most common vintage."

"But I'm not a police officer," Haxorus noted.

"That's okay, Trainer," Her Jenny replied, "I'll protect and serve you as best I can." She winked and added, "As long as you follow the law, of course."

"Thank you, Jenny,” Haxorus said. “I’m Georgia, a Pokémon Trainer. Do you want to come with me on my journey?”

“Of course!” Haxorus' Jenny said with a big smile on her face as she nodded enthusiastically.

“Alright!” said Haxorus. “Welcome to the team.”

“I'll do my best!” Said her Jenny.

“Wow,” said Ash. “Jennies are so cool!”

I can’t believe it, Thought Haxorus. The remote turned her into a special type of Pokémon! That’s so cool!
11512221112111212222233122111.title: Haxorus

choices: "...Stay here with Ash while he makes his phone call."
115122211121112122222331221111.content:
"Near-perfect?" Haxorus asked.

"I look like a person, but I'm a Pokemon, so I can use Pokemon moves," Explained Haxorus' Jenny.

"Do you look any different when you use them?" Asked Haxorus.

Haxorus' Jenny answered, "No, but sometimes people think it's weird when I use a move because of how I look human."

"I don't think that's weird at all," Said Iris.

"Yeah. I think a Pokemon acting human is pretty cool," Added Haxorus.

Jenny smiled, "Thank you. I can tell you're all very kind Trainers."

"So what kind of moves can you use?" asked Haxorus.

"I know the moves Attract, Double Team, Lovely Kiss and Nuzzle," Jenny stated, a heavy blush on her face. It's embarrassing! It's my dream to protect and serve, yet I have these 'cute' moves!"

"It's not that bad, though. Don't all Jennies have those moves?" Haxorus asked

Her Jenny answered, "No. There are a lot of moves a Jenny can learn, and those are the ones I happened to learn."

"Well don't worry. If you don't like those moves, I'll train you to learn new ones!" Promised Haxorus.

Her Jenny smiled and said, "Thank you so much! I'd really appreciate it!"

Haxorus followed behind Ash, Iris and Cilan on their way to the Pokémon Center in town, but most of her attention was focused on Jenny. Mere minutes ago she was a police officer, but now she had become a Pokémon, stripped of her human identity, and she didn't seem to care in the slightest. She simply walked alongside Haxorus, happily humming to herself despite having no clothes on. Haxorus also managed to spot a couple more Jennies out in the wild, and they seemed to get along well with the other Pokémon in the area.

Eventually, the group arrived at the Pokémon Center and Haxorus saw Nurse Joy standing behind the counter with Chansey, an ever-present smile on her face. "Good afternoon; how may I help you?"

"We just want a quick heal-up of our Pokémon, please," Ash said, setting his PokéBalls on a tray, which Pikachu also hopped on. Cilan and Iris started to do the same as Haxorus told Jenny, "You're just gonna get a quick check-up, okay? I'll see you soon."

"No problem!" Jenny happily exclaimed as Haxorus put her back in the PokéBall and set her, Beartic, Bisharp and Vanilluxe on their own tray.

As Joy tended to the Pokémon, Ash said, "I'm going to call Mom and let her know we're just a day away from home."

"I believe I'll go shopping; I'm not sure I packed enough food to keep us fed for the rest of the trip," Cilan said as he took his leave.

"I think I'll look for some berries to give my Pokémon. What're you going to do, Georgia?" Iris asked.

Haxorus thought about it. This thing is so powerful. It made me evolve into a Haxorus, made me switch lives with Georgia without her - or him now, I guess realizing anything was wrong, made Georgia and I switch bodies, and even made Officer Jenny her own species of Pokémon! I wonder what else it can do." She answered, "I'm going to..."
115122211121112122222331221111.title: The group continues to the Pokémon Center with...

choices: Make Joy her own species of Pokémon like Jenny
Swap Ash and his mother's bodies
Swap Ash and his mom's lives (Trainer Son Delia and Stay-at-Home Mom Ash)
Give Ash a girly personality and wardrobe
1151222111211121222223312211111.content:
"...stay here. I'm a little tired from walking around so much."

"Okay, Georgia; feel better soon," Iris said as she gave Haxorus a hug and left.

Haxorus sat in her place and looked around. "This remote is incredible; I wonder what else I can do with it." She looked around and thought about the kinds of changes she could make.

She noticed Nurse Joy standing behind her desk, happily talking to trainers as they walked in. "I already made Jenny her own species of Pokémon; could I make Joy a Pokémon species as well so Jenny isn't the only human-like Pokémon?'

She then looked over and saw Ash talking to a brown-haired woman she assumed was his mother. "Maybe I could get to know Ash's mother better. I do feel more comfortable around girls than I do around guys. However, maybe I don't need to swap something between Ash and his mother in order to hang around more girlish friends."

With a determined look, Haxorus decided to...
1151222111211121222223312211111.title: "...Stay here with Ash while he makes his p...

choices: Make Delia her own species of Pokémon like Jenny.
11512221112111212222233122111115.content: What else could Haxorus decide to do?
11512221112111212222233122111115.title: Something else

choices: Haxorus convinces Ash to call someone else.
Nurse Joy says that the Pokeballs are ready.
115122211121112122222331221111151.content:
Getting an idea, Haxorus approached Ash while he was making his call, hearing him tell her, "-underwear's clean."

Ash's mother smiled and replied, "That's good to know." She noticed Haxorus and asked, "Ash, is this a friend of yours?"

Ash turned his head to see Haxorus and answered, "Oh, this is Georgia. She's Iris' best friend."

Ash's mother said, “It's a pleasure to meet you, Georgia.”

"Thanks. Same here," Said Haxorus. She waved her hand, realizing how small and slender her new human hand was.

Ash turned his head and attention back to his mother, "I can't wait until everyone tries your cooking, mom. It's the best!"

It is? I wonder... Acting quickly, Haxorus aimed her remote at Delia and pushed the button, whipping the remote behind her back as soon as she did so.

On the other side of the screen, Tracey Sketchit smiled, "Thanks Ash, The advice from Professor Oak has really helped me with my sketches."

Haxorus looked confused.

Tracey noticed this and asked, "Hmm? Is something wrong, Georgia?"

Haxorus stalled, not knowing this man's name. "Um... Mister...."

"Oh, you don't have to be formal. Tracey is fine," Tracey told her.

"T-Thank you. Um. Are you Ash's brother or something?" Haxorus asked.

Tracey explained, "Oh, no! I'm Professor Oak's assistant."

Ash turned to Haxorus and explained, "Yeah, he takes care of my house and Mr. Mime when me and mom aren't there."

"So you still think of your Delia as your mother?" Tracey asked.

"Of course," Ash answered. "She's always been the one who's there for me. She takes care of me and feeds me. Even if she is my Pokemon, she'll always be my mom to me."

So it did turn her into a Pokemon, Haxorus thought. But then... "But, don't you have a..." She asked, not sure how to phrase it properly.

Ash shook his head and explained, "I never met my real mom. My dad caught my Delia before I was born and trained her to take care of me, and he did a great job. When he left, she got work at a restaurant in Pallet Town to keep taking care of me. And when I became a Pokemon Trainer, I took my Delia with me while Professor Oak watched the house until Tracey became his assistant. But she's been my mom all my life, so she's still my mom to me."

"That's really sweet," Said Haxorus. And interesting. They must have been really close for Ash to still think of her as his mom even when she's a Pokemon. I wonder if there are other kids like that.

Tracey said, "Yeah, Ash is lucky to have someone like his Delia taking care of him. Well, anyways, I have to go. I have to get this place cleaned up for everyone. See you soon, Ash."

"Okay, Tracey!" Ash hung up.

Amazing. The remote even worked on someone Ash was calling. I wonder if it will work on someone else, Thought Haxorus.
115122211121112122222331221111151.title: Make Delia her own species of Pokémon like Jenny.

choices: Haxorus learns more about Delia from her PokéDex
Haxorus asks Delia about her Pokémon life with Ash
Haxorus uses the remote to make Nurse Joy her own Pokémon species
Haxorus got interrupted by Ash showing off Delia to her
1151222111211121222223312211111512.content:
"Thank you for waiting, everyone; your Pokémon are fully healed," Nurse Joy announced as she and Chansey brought up four trays of Pokémon to the front desk. Pikachu, who was sitting on one of the trays, immediately grabbed the Poké Ball to his immediate right and ran over to Ash's side.

At once, Ash grabbed the Poké Ball, opened up and let the brown-haired woman he was talking to before out. "Mom; I'm so glad you're okay!" Ash said as he happily hugged her.

The woman giggled and said, "It's only been a short while, but I'm happy you're doing well, Ash."

As the two hugged each other for a while longer, another trainer, one who just started on his journey, Haxorus thought, walked in with a naked version of the brown-haired woman and approached Nurse Joy. "Nurse Joy, help! My Delia got really hurt in a battle!"

"Well, let me take her for a while and I"ll make sure she gets good as new," Nurse Joy said with a smile.

Haxorus watched the exchange and got curious about something.
1151222111211121222223312211111512.title: Nurse Joy says that the Pokeballs are ready.

choices: Haxorus decides to look up Joy and Delia in her Pokedex.
Haxorus sees if she can turn more women into Human Pokemon.
11512221112111212222233122111115123.content:
"Okay," Said the young trainer. He turned to his Delia and said, "You be good, okay Delia?"

"Don't worry, dear. I'll be just fine," His Delia promised him with a smile before letting her Trainer return her to her Poke Ball.

Amazing. Even though she's hurt, she wants to make sure her trainer isn't worried, Realized Haxorus. But now I wonder... Looking around to make sure she wasn't watched, Haxorus pointed the remote at Nurse Joy and pressed the button.

Nothing seemed to have changed. Joy was still in her uniform. But when the boy passed her his Poke Ball Joy took it to a tube that Haxorus hadn't seen before. The Poke Ball was sent up the tube where it went into the wall.

"Um, where did it go?" The boy asked.

The Pokemon Center's joy explained, "The Pokemon Center Doctor will look at your Delia. If she's really hurt, he'll be sure to take good care of her. If she's okay, he'll return your Pokemon to us. But don't worry, because he's trained me and Audino to make sure she's fighting fit in no time." She turned to the Pokemon Center's Audino. "Isn't that right, Audino?"

The Pokemon Center's Audino walked forward, and Haxorus realized that Audino was wearing the same dress as the Pokemon Center's Joy. "Audino!" It said with a bow.

"Thanks!" Said the young trainer.

The Pokemon Center's Joy replied, "No problem. It's what we're trained for!"

So now Audino's wearing clothes? I guess it makes sense because they're both Pokemon so it doesn't make sense if only one of them is wearing clothes? Still, I didn't expect that to happen, Thought Haxorus.

Curious about the other Human Pokémon she'd created, Haxorus turned to talk to Ash and Delia. However, she noticed Ash was playing with Pikachu, with Delia nowhere to be seen. "Hay, where'd Delia go?"

"She went to get dressed. It's easier for Jenny, Delia and Joy to get healed at the Pokémon Center if they don't have any clothes or accessories getting in the way."

"Okay, but is there a reason Delia and Joy are wearing clothes when Jenny doesn't?"

Ash looked at Haxorus and said, "Well, Joy's dressed like that because that's the Pokémon Centers' official uniform for Pokémon. The Jennies on the Police Force have their own uniform. As for Mom..."

Ash gave Haxorus a confused look. "Uh, how come you don't know this stuff, Georgia?"

Haxorus replied, "Oh, um..."
11512221112111212222233122111115123311.title: Dad trained her to wear clothes to act like a r...

choices: Haxorus thanks Doctor Fennel's Aurea and hangs up.
115122211121112122222331221111151233112.content:
"Oh, oh I was just curious about your Delia. Sorry, Ash," Replied Haxorus. "If you'll excuse me please?"

Ash replied, "Um, okay?" As he watched Iris' best friend walk away he shrugged to himself. How weird, He thought. "Ah well. Let's hope Cilan comes back with the groceries soon, right Pikachu?"

"Pika!"

Haxorus approached the phone. Iris isn't here. Who's smart and someone I can call? Concentrating, she found a memory of Georgia's and began to dial.

The monitor turned on. "Hello? Oh! Georgia! How nice to see you!"

Haxorus said, "Hi, Professor Aurea! Um. I wanted to ask you some questions about Pokemon like Joy, Jenny, and Delia, please?"

Professor Aurea blinked. "Sure, what would you like to ask?"

Hazorus paused. What if she thinks I'm weird for asking like Ash did? What if every person thinks I'm weird because they know this stuff and I don't? If only there was a Pokemon I could ask- of course! Haxorus pulled out her remote and pointed it at the screen.

Professor Aurea began to speak, "Um- Georgia-"

Haxorus pushed the button.

"What is that?" Asked Professor Fennel's Aurea.

"Oh this? Don't worry about it, please," Replied Haxorus.

"Um. Okay," Said Professor Fennel's Aurea.

"I hope you don't think this is weird. Why do-" Haxorus paused. "Why do Aureas, Joys, Jennies, and Delias wear clothes?" Haxorus asked.

"Oh! Don't worry about it. I'm always happy to answer questions for Pokemon Trainers. Although we're not human, our bodies are similar to human bodies so it's easy for us to wear human clothing. Usually we wear clothing after we're caught in order to distinguish us from wild Pokemon of our species. That way no one tries to catch us by accident."

"Do you need to wear clothes after you're caught? Do people want you to wear clothes?"

"We don't need to wear clothes, Georgia, and because we're Pokemon, people don't mind if we wear clothes or not. Of course, wearing clothes in a professional setting helps people have faith that we're being professional. That's what uniforms are for, after all. That's why I'm wearing clothes right now."

Haxorus nodded and asked, "Do Pokemon like you prefer wearing clothes?"

Doctor Fennel's Aurea shrugged and answered, "Whatever our trainer prefers. We're okay with it either way."

"What about when you battle? Do you still wear clothes?"

"Usually we undress for battling so as to not damage our clothes. On the other hand, when we're on the job sometimes we use our Pokemon Moves to help people."

"But my Jenny I just caught said sometimes people think it's strange when she uses a Pokemon Move."

Doctor Fennel's Aurea nodded. "Wild Jennies usually learn that from their parents because they see young kids who are surprised by it. Most adults don't think it any stranger than when other Pokemon use their Moves, and the few who do usually come to accept it as another part of our fascinating world of People and Pokemon."
115122211121112122222331221111151233112.title: Haxorus excuses herself and calls someone else.

choices: Is there a store with clothing specifically for Human Pokémon?
What kinds of moves can Human Pokémon learn?
Where do I find more Human Pokémon?
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
Haxorus had many questions running through her mind. "This new reality is so confusing! If Pokémon can wear clothes, are there clothes that are specifically for Pokémon? How do these new Human Pokémon learn their moves, and how vast is their move pool? Where can I get a Joy, Delia and Aurea of my own? And, since all the Humans I turned into Pokémon are females, how do they..." Haxorus blushed at the thought of that question.

"Georgia, is there something wrong?" Professor Fennel's Aurea asked.

Haxorus looked up and said, "Oh, nothing! Nothing. Say, Aurea..."
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.title: Haxorus asks more questions.

choices: Haxorus thanks Professor Fennel's Aurea and hangs up.
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
"Is there a store with clothing specifically for Human Pokémon?" Asked Haxorus.

Professor Fennel's Aurea shook her head. "No. As Human Pokemon, we don't wear clothes for our own style. When we wear clothing, we wear it for the same reasons most people wear it: For comfort, protection from the elements, pockets for carrying the equipment we use, and to be taken more seriously in professional settings. We're just fine taking clothes from clothing stores that mostly cater to people, so there's no store with clothing especially for us."

I wonder if making a new Human Pokemon could change that, Thought Haxorus. "Do Pokemon who aren't Human Pokemon wear clothes?"

Professor Fennel's Aurea shook her head again, "Most don't. The custom fit is arduous and easily damaged in battle, so it's quite rare. I think the main exceptions are the Pokemon Center where the Pokemon who work there aren't expected to battle, and Pokemon Performances and the like, and even then the clothes are only for the non-battle sections."

"Oh." Haxorus paused for a moment before she asked, "My Jenny said she wanted to learn new moves. What moves can they learn? How do they learn new moves?"

Professor Fennel's Aurea answered, "The same way all Pokemon do: with lots practice and a goal in mind, or in a flash of inspiration cemented by re-enforcement training. And of course, as her Pokemon Trainer you can be a great help, providing support and direction. I'd suggest you find other Jennies and ask them what moves they know, so that you and your Jenny can decide what moves you'd like her to learn. With enough time, I'm sure the two of you can work towards a moveset you'll both be satisfied with."

"Do you know where I can catch more Human Pokemon?" Haxorus asked.

Professor Fennel thought, "Wherever you found your Jenny, there are probably others. Jennies and Joys are native to every reason. Delias are a Pokemon native to the Kanto region, and Aureas like me are native to Unova, and we're usually attracted to areas of large-scale intellectual activity. Other than that, wild Pokemon decide where to live, so it's up to you as a Pokemon Trainer to find and catch them."

"Thank you. Now, how do Human Pokemon breed?" Asked Haxorus.

Professor Fennel's Aurea blushed. She whispered, "My Trainer, Professor Fennel, says it's not really something we should be telling you at your age, Georgia, sorry." She resumed a normal volume as she spoke the rest, "What I can tell you is that the process results in an Egg that soon hatches into the Human Pokemon, whose appearance is basically unchanged throughout their lifespan. "Although they're capable of using their attacks and speaking as Pokemon do almost from birth as normal Pokemon are, they usually need a few months to learn how to speak human, although any Human Pokemon raised in the wild usually learns this from their parents."

Haxorus nodded. "I see."

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
As Haxorus was talking to Professor Fennel's Aurea, the doors to the Pokemon Center opened. Haxorus saw a Joy enter the facility. She was naked, and her hair was down.

"This might be your chance to catch a Joy," Professor Fennel's Aurea told Haxorus. "You can ask me more questions later."

"Oh, okay. I will, and thank you so much for all your help!" Replied Haxorus.

"No problem!" Replied Professor Fennel's Aurea before Haxorus hung up.

The Joy approached the Pokemon Center's Joy who was standing behind the counter.

"Can I help you?" Asked the Pokemon Center's Joy.

The naked Joy replied, "Yes. I was hoping to become a Pokemon Center Pokemon."

The Pokemon Center's Joy replied, "Have you been trained?"

The naked Joy shook her head and said, "No, but I was hoping I could get trained here and I promise to work really hard."

"I don't doubt it, but unfortunately our training classes for Pokemon Center Pokemon are on a very strict schedule. New classes will begin in a few months. If you're a wild Joy, why don't you find a trainer to stay with in the meantime so you can better learn to be around humans?"

The Pokemon Trainers in the Pokemon Center went silent to hear the wild Joy's response.

The wild joy nodded. She turned to the crowd, bowed, and said. "Hello everyone. I'm a Joy who's looking for a nice Pokemon Trainer to be with before Pokemon Center Pokemon Classes start. I'd like to-"

"Are you sure you can't stay with us?" Asked one Trainer.

The wild Joy replied, "I guess I'm trusting you to let me train to be a Pokemon Center Pokemon when it's time, but as a Pokemon I'd respect the wishes of my Trainer as long as they're kind and good."

"You're not trained at all?" Asked another Trainer.

The wild Joy shook her head again and said, "I'd do my best to learn a Move that can do that, but right now I know Tackle and Defense Curl."

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
Haxorus watched as the other trainers appeared less interested in capturing the wild Joy, with some making verbal comments.

"Only those moves? I might as well catch a Rattata!"

"Pass; unless she learns a healing move really quick, she's useless on my team."

"I don't know if I'm ready to handle raising a practical baby of a Joy."

Seeing Joy's downtrodden look at these comments, Haxorus stomped over and shouted at everyone, "What's wrong with you? Just because she's young and inexperienced doesn't mean she's a lost cause! You're all supposed to be trainers; I thought you'd be nicer than that to any Pokémon you come across! Joy doesn't deserve any of you if all you care about is the traditional use of the Pokémon!"

"Ma'am," the Pokémon Center's Joy said as she placed a hand on Joy's shoulder. "I appreciate your sticking up of my fellow Pokémon, but could you keep your voice down? Some Pokémon we have recuperating here don't like loud noises."

"Sorry," Haxorus replied with a bow, a blush appearing on her face. Then...
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.title: The Pokemon Trainers get less enthusiastic abou...

choices: Some of the kids compliment Ash on his Delia, and a few want to trade for her.
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
The wild Joy approached Haxorus, "Miss... what's your name?"

Haxorus introduced herself, "I'm Georgia."

"Miss Georgia, what you said meant a lot to me. You seem like someone who's nice to Pokemon. Can I join you until Pokemon Center Pokemon Classes start?" Asked the wild Joy.

Haxorus smiled and said, "Of course." She pulled out a Poke Ball.

The wild Joy extended her hand and gently pushed the button on the Poke Ball. She entered it, and the Poke Ball wiggled once before blinking softly to confirm the capture.

Haxorus was about to raise her hand in triumph, but she remembered what the Pokemon Center's Joy said and just quietly held the Poke Ball close, saying "Thank you Joy. I promise to take good care of you."

The Pokemon Center's Joy smiled and said, "Congrats, Georgia. Make sure to take good care of her."

"I will," Haxorus promised.

"I think you'll be great at it, Georgia," Ash's Delia said sweetly. She had finished dressing herself, and now looked the way she did when Haxorus had first called her.

Haxorus looked away from the Poke Ball and replied, "Thank you, Delia."

Ash's Delia then said kindly, "You were very nice with that Joy, but you can be kind to Pokemon without being hard towards your fellow trainers. Many of them are young too, Georgia."

Haxorus blinked and said, "Huh? Oh, I see what you mean, Delia." She turned to the other trainers and apologized, "Sorry, everyone."

Ash's Delia then turned towards all the other trainers. She also bowed to the group and said, "And to the trainers who said those things, you can be honest about not wanting to catch a Pokemon without being mean to that Pokemon. Remember, it's not just about Trainers being kind to their Pokemon, but about all of us being kind to each other."

One of the Pokemon Trainers who had spoken earlier replied, "I'm sorry too. I guess I shouldn't be so harsh."

Ash's Delia smiled and said, "No problem. What's important is that you've learned something."

Ash Ketchum walked up and said, "Congrats, Georgia. That makes two Pokemon you've caught today."

Haxorus smiled, "Thanks, Ash. I promise to take good care of them."

Ash's Delia smiled, "I'm glad to hear it. And if you need any help, I'm sure your friends can help."

Haxorus nodded and said, "Right."

Haxorus noticed a large stack of magazines on a table in the lobby. "Maybe I can make more Human Pokémon using these magazines? I know I can use the remote on people I'm looking at in person and over the phone, but can it work with pictures?"

She sat down and scoured through the magazines and came across several women she wanted to test her remote on. The most prominent ones were a women named Elesa modeling the latest in fashionable dresses https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/4/40/... , a girl named Misty starring in a show while dressed as a mermaid https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/b/b2/... , a matronly woman named Melony showing off her Ice-type Pokémon https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb... , and a woman named Olivia standing in front of a tropical setting while showing off jewelry made from shiny stones https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb... .

Haxorus thought, "Let's see if I can make Human Pokémon from photos." She pressed the button on the remote and observed the results.

Amazing. This is almost too easy! Thought Haxorus.

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
Haxorus was stunned to see herself in the picture next to Diantha, the famous actress and Champion of Kalos. She read the article. It all seemed the same, except for some new questions near the end:

Q: How do you handle being an actress, a Champion, and a mother?
A: Well, before I say anything else I should say that I couldn't do it without the help of my skilled assistant, Kathi Lee. It's hard work being all of those three, but each is a role I'm honored to have in my life. I'm always sure to schedule my shoots so that I have plenty of time to be at the yearly Kalos conference. Even so, I always let those I shoot my movies with know in advance that I may need to go at a moment's notice on Champion business, and I'm lucky to have such gracious co-workers. As for being a mother, well, when Georgia was young I made sure to spend all the time with her that I could. But knowing that I would be as busy as I am, I made sure to catch and train a Delia, an Aurea, and a Jenny long before I gave birth to Georgia to make sure she was raised, taught, and protected as we traveled Kalos, even when I couldn't do it myself.

Haxorus paused. Concentrating, she had flashes of memory, remembering her new mother Diantha and Diantha's Human Pokemon that had helped to raise her. She resumed reading.

Q: I see. And where is Georgia now?
A: She's traveling the world as a Pokemon Trainer. I offered her my Human Pokemon to take care of her, but she said she wanted to catch her own Pokemon. I was so proud of her when she caught Cubchoo, and I'm still proud of her now. If you're reading this, Georgia, your mother misses you and hopes to see you soon!

Haxorus smiled. This is incredible. I have a famous mother now, all thanks to this remote. She looked at the remote, memorizing the button she had pressed by mistake. So it's this button. Got it.

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
Haxorus checked her memory and recalled a number she could call to talk to her new mother whenever she wanted. "I just hope Kathi Lee doesn't interrupt or answer again," Haxorus frustratingly thought. She then giggled and thought, "Wow, I instinctively know that feeling? This remote is weird."

She then looked at the magazines and thought, "Okay, before I do anything else, I'd like to round out the Human Pokémon roster." She then looked up the Human Pokémon she had already created to double-check something.

"Olivia, the Guardian Pokémon. Rock-type. Olivia are more capable of communicating with Pokémon of different species than others, particularly aggressive Pokémon, though they are mostly known for caring for smaller, defenseless Pokémon. They are known for crafting intricately-made trinkets out of rocks to symbolize their connection to others, but are known to be clumsy while walking in unfamiliar terrain. They are mainly found in the Alola region."

"Melony, the Stern Coach Pokémon. Ice-type. A Melony’s body can withstand the harshest winter weather, making it a valuable Pokémon for hikers and villagers high in the mountains when foraging for food or seeking shelter. Other Pokémon seek out Melonys to test their skill, which Melonys will help refine if they manage to defeat them. Melonys with this kind of relationship with other Pokémon treat them like their children and can be very doting and protective. They are mainly found in the Galar region."

"Misty, the Mermaid Pokémon. Water-type. Mistys live in any kind of water and are known for their aggressive outbursts when disturbed. They are most friendly to children and baby Pokémon who come close, and will sing and play with them to make them happy. Despite usually accepting any Pokémon or humans near their territories, they have an unusual hatred for Bug-type Pokémon. They are mainly found in the Kanto region, but can be found all over the world."

"Elesa, the Model Pokémon. Electric-type. Elesa usually have a playful attitude and strike poses to get any Pokémon or human to cheer for them. While in Altering Forme, they use the cords attached to their ears to absorb electricity from any surface touched, even static electricity. While in Direct Forme, they continually discharge electricity from the antennae on their ears until they are drained of energy. They are mainly found in the Unova region."

"So Elesa has two forms?" Haxorus thought as she looked at the two Elesas in the magazine. Apparently, the yellow-haired Elesa was the Altering Forme, with long black cables over the headphones covering her ears now part of her body. Meanwhile the black-haired Elesa was the Direct Forme, with horns on her headphones now serving as part of her body.

"So including Jenny, Joy, Delia and Aurea, there is now a Human Pokémon for the Fighting, Fairy, Normal, Psychic, Rock, Ice, Water and Electric types. It feels incomplete without a Human Pokémon for every type," Haxorus thought as...
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.title: Haxorus returns to making more Human Pokemon.

Haxorus had figured that it would be better if people who specialized in the types she wanted to become the Human Pokémon of those types, as well as them being female to fit in with the ones she had already made Human Pokémon. However, she soon discovered that not many women became specialists, at least in a few types. She then looked over her options.

After careful deliberation, she used her remote to create the remaining Human Pokémon, then looked up their entries in the PokéDex.

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
As Haxorus considered her next move, she saw Ash coming back and hid the remote before Ash could see it.

Ash said, "Sorry about that, Georgia. I just needed some fresh air for a bit." He leaned in and whispered, "She's not the first trainer who wanted to trade for my Delia."

Ash's Delia laughed and gave Ash a loving pat on the head, "That just shows how well you've kept up my training, sweetie."

"Thanks, mom," Ash replied. "So what have you been doing, Georgia?"

"Oh, just looking at magazines," Haxorus replied.

"Huh?" Ash leaned over, reading the article that Haxorus had left open. "Oh! Is this your mom?" He asked. "Iris said your mom was a Pokemon Champion."

Haxorus nodded, "Yeah. She's an actress too."

"I can't wait to meet her!" Said Ash. "And Iris has been really excited to meet her too."

"Yeah." Iris doesn't have a mom, Haxorus realized. Maybe I can use the remote on Iris when she gets back so she can be in my family too.

"Oh yeah, speaking of meeting..." Ash pulled out a Poke Ball and opened it. "Hey Misty, I want you to meet someone."

Out came a Pokemon. Haxorus recognized it as Misty, one of the four new Human Pokemon she had just created. It actually made her a mermaid? Thought Haxorus in amazement as she looked at Ash's Misty. Her mermaid tail was now real and a little longer than her human half and the lovely, voluminous orange hair that ran down her back. "Oh! A Misty, right?"

Ash's Misty nodded and replied, "Yes. It's nice to meet you. I'm Ash's Misty."

"I'm Georgia," Said Haxorus as she pulled out her Pokedex. "Misty, the Mermaid Pokémon. Water-type. Mistys live in any kind of water and are known for their aggressive outbursts when disturbed. They are most friendly to children and baby Pokémon who come close, and will sing and play with them to make them happy. Despite usually accepting any Pokémon or humans near their territories, they have an unusual hatred for Bug-type Pokémon. They are mainly found in the Kanto region, but can be found all over the world." "Wow Ash. How long have you had her?"

"Since my first day of Pokemon Training," Said Ash. "I met her when I accidentally got a bunch of Spearow mad. I was running next to the river when I saw her resting on the riverbank. I thought she could help get Pikachu to safety so I called out to her."

Ash's Misty continued the story. "I was relaxing, just humming to myself, when I heard this kid yell out to me. I started to yell at him when he shoved his Pikachu and Pikachu's Poke Ball into my arms and told me to take Pikachu somewhere safe. I was about to ask what he thought he was doing when I saw the flock of Spearow approach. He actually promised to catch and defeat all of them by himself and dared them to get him."

Ash laughed a bit."But Pikachu saved us. He beat them all with one Thunderbolt, didn't you Pikachu?"

"Pika!" Pikachu replied happily.

Ash then said, "When Pikachu and I woke up, all the Spearow were gone and we got to see Ho'oh. I picked Pikachu up, and then I saw that Misty was knocked out, so I caught her to take her to the Pokemon Center."

"His Pikachu zapped me!" Exclaimed Misty. "So when I saw Ash at Pokemon Center after the Doctor there healed me I was so mad at him. I said, "Whoever you are, you are going to pay for this!" " She smiled, "And he did, by training me ever since. He really does care about Pokemon. He's so different from the Sensational Sisters."

"The Sensational Sisters?" Asked Haxorus.

Ash's Misty explained, "They're the Gym Leaders of Cerulean City. They caught and trained my three sisters, but they called me a runt and said they already caught a Misty for each of them, so they left without catching me."

"They separated you from your sisters? That's so mean!" Said Haxorus.

"It happens," Said Ash's Misty. "Sometimes there are more Pokemon in a place than Pokemon Trainers. Besides, if they had caught me I wouldn't have had the chance to be trained by Ash. He lets me call my three sisters, and they're really happy. The Sensational Sisters take good care of them."

"Oh wow. You're really nice," Haxorus replied.

Ash patted his Misty on the head, "She's been a great Pokemon. I couldn't have gotten this far without her."

Misty smiled, "Thanks, Trainer. You're the best."

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
The Pokemon Center's Joy quietly walked up to Haxorus and politely asked, "Miss Georgia?"

"Yes?" Haxorus asked back.

"It's your mother," The Pokemon Center's Joy whispered. She pointed to a phone and said, "You can answer her from there."

"Okay, thank you," Replied Haxorus.

As the Pokemon Center's Joy returned to the counter, Ash began to shout, "Oh wow. Is that-"

"Shh!" Haxorus said, strangely instinctively. "Don't tell everyone!"

"Oh, sorry Georgia," Ash said.

Haxorus paused. I just said that without knowing. Hazorus suddenly remembered the need for secrecy, and how "she" came to Unova in the first place so people wouldn't recognize her as Diantha's daughter on sight. I guess I should keep private? Wow. This remote really changed things. That gave her an idea, and she said, "Ash, please let me take this phone call by myself."

"But..." Ash was interrupted by the growling of his stomach.

"Should I make you a small snack to tide you over before Cilan arrives?" Ash's Delia offered.

Ash nodded, "Yes, please."

"Alright. We'll give Georgia her privacy," Said Ash's Delia as she led Ash away with his Pikachu and Misty.

Haxorus picked up the magazine with the picture of her and her mother Just so no one sees this in the meantime, and went to the phone the Pokemon Center's Joy had pointed to and answered. "Mom?" She whispered.

Kalos Champion Diantha's face appeared on the monitor, "Hello sweetie. How are you doing?"

"I'm doing fine, mom," Haxorus answered. "I'm almost at Pallet Town to start the Kanto Gym Challenge."

Diantha replied, "That's wonderful, Georgia. And I have some good news. My latest movie finished post-production, so now I have some free time. Kathi Lee got everything organized, so now I'll be leaving to see you in Pallet Town. I should be able to get there by the time you do."

Haxorus said, "That's great! I can't wait for my friends to meet you!"

"I can't wait to meet them either," Replied Diantha. "And I promise to bring a copy of my movie for an exclusive viewing."

My first movie watching as a human! This is the best! "You're the best, mom!"

"Oh, hey; one thing before you go!"

"Yes, dear?"

The three Human Pokémon blushed as Diantha said, "Well, they're accompanying me on a shoot today, so Kathi Lee contacted a pretty high-end store to get clothes for them. Don't worry; they'll wear more common clothes for our stay in Pallet Town."

Just mention to the clerk or shop attendant that you have those specific Human Pokémon and they'll direct you to a special section with clothes that fit them."

"Really, there are just special sections, not entire stores?"

"Everything with time," Diantha's Delia responded. "With how popular having at least one Human Pokémon is becoming, I'm sure it's only a matter of time before a store dedicated solely to Human Pokémon will come along. For now, though, we have to make due with what we've got."

"Okay. Well, sorry to have kept you for so long."

"Don't be, honey," Diantha said with a calming smile. "It's always nice to hear from you. Besides, tomorrow at the latest, we can talk for as long as we want without any complications."

"Miss Diantha, it's time for your interview!" A short-haired woman with red-rimmed glasses said as she briefly came into frame.

Diantha sighed and said, "Well, it looks like duty calls. I'll see you tomorrow, okay?"

"Okay, Mom; love you!"

"I love you too, Georgia," were the final words out of Diantha's mouth before she hung up.

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
Haxorus smiled and thought to herself, Having a mom is great, especially a famous one. I need to share this with Iris. She waited by the entrance, remote behind her back, hearing the sounds of the doors opening and watching as people went in and out. It wasn't long until she saw Iris walk in, her arms full of berries. Haxorus quickly pointed the remote at Iris and pushed the button, hiding the remote as soon as she was done.

"Sis? Are you here sis?" Iris called out.

Haxorus beamed, as she knew immediately it had worked. She called out, "I'm over here!"

Iris smiled back and replied, "Hey! What are you doing hiding there?"

"Let's find a place to talk in private," Said Haxorus, still smiling.

"Um, okay," Said Iris.

~~

The two found themselves in a private room in the Pokemon Center. Iris put her berries down.

"Mom called. She says she's coming," Said Haxorus.

Iris whooped, "Really! When?!"

"She said she's going to see us in Pallet Town," Answered Haxorus.

"That's great! Is she bringing her Pokemon?" Iris asked. When Haxorus nodded, Iris asked, "Her Human Pokemon too?"

Haxorus replied, "Yeah!"

"I can't wait to see them. It's been so long, and I still remember how they took care of us when mom was busy," Said Iris.

Haxorus paused. She did remember at least some of those moments of the two being young sisters, traveling with their mother. Sometimes they were at the studio, watching her act. Other times they were being taken around the area around the shoot by Diantha's Delia, while being protected by Diantha's Jenny. They didn't have a school to go to, so Diantha's Aurea was their teacher. Haxorus remembered when "she" and Iris did some sneaking and were amazed to learn that Diantha's Aurea was being trained (or at least re-trained) in the same material she was teaching her and Iris. And sometimes it was just them and their mommy, together and happy. Would the real Georgia remember more? But then, if I hadn't switched places with Georgia, she wouldn't be Diantha's daughter? This is really weird...

"Hello... Earth to Georgia? Are you okay?" Asked Iris with concern.

"Huh. Oh, just remembering stuff," Lied Haxorus. Yeah, I should focus on making things really good for my best friend Iris.
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.title: Iris returns, giving Haxorus the chance to add ...

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
"Hey, Georgia?"

"Yeah, Iris?"

"You ever wish Mom would settle down with someone? I know she's busy all the time, but now, with us traveling the world, she must be so lonely."

Haxorus looked at Iris and asked, "I take it you have someone in mind?"

"A few actually. Granted, I don't know how well Mom would get along with them in real life, but I think it'd be interesting to have another Mom."

"Wait, you want two Moms?"

"Problem?"

"No, it's just...you kinda caught me by surprise. Anyway, who did you have in mind?"

"Well, the first one is that president of the Aether Foundation, Lusa...something..."

"Lusamine?" Haxorus asked, having just read about her.

"Yeah, her! Not only does she have a foundation that helps Pokémon whose habitats were destroyed, but she also has a daughter around our age! Can you imagine having a third sister?"

"She has a son, too, doesn't she?"

"Yeah, but he seems too distant to want to hang out with us."

"Okay, who else did you have in mind for a second mother?"

"Clair!"

"The Blackthorn Gym Leader?"

"Yeah! Having a mom who is an incredible Dragon-type trainer? Why wouldn't I want that in my life?"

"Fair enough. Anyone else?"

"Honestly, either Professors Ivy or Fennel. It just seems like they love the Pokémon they study and take care of for trainers."

Haxorus took Iris' words to heart and, as Iris was looking away distracted by something, used the remote to get their second mother.
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.title: Haxorus asks who Iris would have as a second mo...

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
Haxorus held up the magazine she was holding and said, "Hey, sis. Let me put this magazine back. I'll be right back, I promise."

Iris nodded and replied, "Oh, sure. But when we get back, we need to talk about how to get ready for when mom gets here."

"No problem," Haxorus responded. With that, she returned to the Pokemon Center. She took one last look at the magazine she was holding. Now the story about Diantha included mentioning both of her daughters. Haxorus put the magazine at the bottom of the pile and found the magazine with Lusamine that she had seen earlier. She got to the page with Lusamine's picture and used the remote. Haxorus smiled as she flashed back to a quick scene of the six of them - Diantha, Lusamine, "Georgia," Iris, Lillie, and Gladion - spending time together as a family in Aether Foundation. This should make Iris happy, Thought Haxorus.

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
Lusamine, the President of Aether Foundation, was working on her computer when she heard her phone ring. She picked up the phone and answered, "Alola. Lusamine of Aether Foundation. How can I help you?"

"Tied to your work as always, my lovely Lusamine?"

Lusamine smiled, "I'm finishing up so that I'm free to join you, my dearest Diantha. Once I'm done, Wicke and Faba should be able to handle things here without me for a few days. We'll be meeting in Pallet Town, yes?"

"Yes, I've already talked to Georgia. She and Iris will see us there," Diantha replied. "And what of Lillie and Gladion? Shall I be able to see them too?"

Lusamine gave a heavy sigh and explained, "Lillie I know will be happy to join us, but Gladion is still training somewhere. I will try to find him, but..."

"I understand," Said Diantha. "Pity. We really must all get together one day."

"Agreed," Replied Lusamine. "I know we will, Tapus willing."

"I'll leave you to your work, then. Farewell, my love."

"And farewell to you, my dearest" Lusamine said. She heard the click of Diantha ending the call and smiled. It seems like a lifetime since I've seen them. I only hope I can make up for lost time.
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.title: Meanwhile, Diantha calls Lusamine about the tri...

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
After a couple of hours, Lusamine stretched and said, "Finally! Now I need to get Lillie and myself ready."

"Ready for what?" Lillie asked, poking her head in the door.

Lusamine, instead of getting angry at being spied on, simply smiled and said, "Well, we're going to Pallet Town to see Iris, Georgia and Mom!"

"Really?!" Lillie asked, a broad smile crossing her face.

"That's right," Lusamine said.

"Thanks, Mama!" Lillie said as she hugged Lusamine. "It's been so long since we've seen the rest of our family!"

"Don't I know it."

"Everyone's ready to go!"

Lusamine looked up and saw her favorite Human Pokémon, Melony and Olivia, approach her desk, holding four other PokéBalls. Olivia wore a white swimsuit and stone bracelets featuring a chiseled head of each of Lusamie and Diantha's children on each bracelet. Melony, however, wore no clothes, which she explained as a result of her training so hard on Mount Lanakila all her life.

"Thank you both," Lusamine said. "Melony, could you please help Lillie pack her bags?"

"Of course, Ma'am."

As Lillie rushed off to pack her bags...

Maybe I should go back to making more Human Pokemon. Hmm. If I do, should I fill out the remaining types, or maybe I should try to make Pokemon that do special things for people?

1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content: Looking over the magazines, Haxorus made her decision. Okay. Let me see if I can make Human Pokemon that do special things for people. I mean, regular Pokemon help people all the time, so why not Human Pokemon? And besides, this will let me test if I can do more things with the remote than just push the button. Haxorus looked through the magazines again, looking for some good first candidates.
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.title: Haxorys makes more Human Pokemon to fill certai...

choices: Haxorus decides to make more Human Pokemon.
Ash's Misty evolves into a Linnea.
1151222111211121222223312211111512331121.content:
Haxorus's first pick was a picture of an unassuming Pokemon Breeder from Unova ( https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/d/da/... ). She concentrated, Okay, let's see. Some kind of food Pokemon? Focusing on that thought, Haxorus aimed her remote at the picture and pushed the button.

The picture changed to show the same young woman standing naked next to someone who looked like a farmer. Two plump Tamato berries hung from her ears like earrings, their weight not seeming to bother the new Pokemon in the slightest. Haxorus decided to not waste any more time and went to check her Pokedex. Amala, the Harvest Pokemon. Grass-Type. Not only does an Amala's body produce nutritious milk and eggs, her fast-growing hair can be milled into rich flour, and the move Autotomize allows her to shed unneeded body fat that is healthy when used for cooking purposes. There are many varieties of Amala; each variety is distinguished by the type of berry that grows from her ears. Amalas are mainly found in the Unova Region, but can be found near many agricultural areas worldwide.

Haxorus grinned from ear to ear. It worked! Okay, I know who to go to next. Haxorus dug through the stack of magazines that were on the Pokemon Center Table until she found a picture of Valerie, the Kalosian Gym Leader ( https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/1/18/... ). Clothing! I want a clothing Pokemon now! With silk and everything! She pushed the button, then checked the Pokedex. Valerie, the Weaver Pokemon. Bug and Fairy-type. A Valerie's hair, milk, and webbing can be all worked into high-quality clothing materials. Valeries learn to craft these materials into creative and brightly-colored garments with their deft hands, and many wild and Trained Valeries provide clothing for themselves, other Human Pokemon, or their Trainers. Valeries are mainly found in the Kalos region.

Perfect! That should be enough for a special Human Pokemon Clothing store, right? Now what to... As Haxorus thought, her eyes looked at the new picture of four girls dressed in lovely furisodes and standing next to the Valeries that had woven them. One of them caught her eye - a young woman with sparkling blue eyes and long, soft red hair (or at least close enough to red for Haxorus) ( https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/6/61/... ) Haxorus thought back to Misty. Hmm... maybe someone a little older so um... no one needs to breed a Misty. Okay. An evolved form of Misty... who can become human... and... uh... Haxorus thought back to Misty's Pokedex entry. No more aggressive outbursts. Someone calm and polite, someone you could uh... Haxorus focused, thinking back on something her Mom and Mama would do, before deciding, Have tea with! Haxorus aimed and pushed the button. The four Furisode girls were now three, and Haxorus went to her Pokedex. Linnea, the Polite Hostess Pokemon. The evolved form of Misty. A Misty can evolve into Linnea after learning Teatime and coming to control her aggressive outbursts, which disappear entirely upon evolution. In Human Forme, Linneas are famous for their politeness and are easily trained to entertain guests, including at tea parties and traditional ceremonies. In Mermaid Form, a Linnea battles with serene grace Linneas, like Mistys, are mainly found in the Kanto region, but can be found all over the world.

Much better! Thought Haxorus, smiling.
