choices: Haxorus and Iris found wild Phoebes.
Haxorus and Iris found wild Shellies.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content: What kind of Human Pokémon did Haxorus and Iris encounter?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus and Iris found a Human Pokémon from Ho...

choices: Phoebe wants to join Haxorus' team.
Phoebe doesn't want to join Haxorus' team.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
As Haxorus looked over the hill, he saw a pair of Human Pokémon, both of which had tanned skin, short black hair and blue eyes. However, one of them, who seemed to be older, judging by the lines on her face, had a pink flower on either side of her head, while the younger one didn’t. The two Human Pokémon were accompanied by a wild Gengar.

“Aren’t those Phoebes?” said Iris, turning to Haxorus. “I thought they were native to Hoenn.”

“They are,” said Haxorus, looking at Iris. “But Professor Oak said that people are trying to bring Human Pokémon from their native regions to other regions. That’s probably why these Phoebes are here.”

“Oh, okay,” said Iris. “The older Phoebe must be the younger Phoebe’s mother, and the Gengar is probably the father.”

“Yeah, you’re probably right,” said Haxorus. “Do you think she’d want to join my team?”

“I suppose it couldn’t hurt to ask her,” said Iris.

“Phoebe?”

Haxorus and Iris both cried out and jumped in surprise. While they had been talking, the younger Phoebe had sneaked up behind them. The younger Phoebe giggled as she watched Haxorus and Iris jump in surprise, then turn around to face her.

“What?” said Iris, looking at the younger Phoebe in confusion, then looking back down the hill at where the Gengar and the older Phoebe were still standing, looking up at them. “How’d you get behind us?”

“Be, Phoebe,” said the younger Phoebe. She started to float a few inches above the ground, then floated towards Iris. The younger Phoebe passed through Iris harmlessly, her body turning translucent as she phased through Iris.

“You’re a Ghost-type,” said Haxorus. “You just floated through the hill and popped up behind us.”

“Phoe, Phoebe!” said the younger Phoebe, smiling and nodding. Her smile quickly disappeared, and she cocked her head curiously. “Phoebe?”

“Huh?” said Iris. “Oh, did you want to know why we’re out here?”

“Phoe,” said the younger Phoebe, nodding.

“Well, I asked Gracie if she knew if there were any Human Pokémon nearby, so she brought us out here,” said Haxorus, pointing down at Gracie, who was sitting on her Rhyhorn on the other side of the hill.

“Be, Phoebe!” said the younger Phoebe, waving down at Gracie.

“Grace!” said Gracie, waving back at the younger Phoebe.

“I came out here because I wanted to catch another Human Pokémon for my team,” said Haxorus. “If you want, you can come with me.”

“Be,” said Phoebe thoughtfully, resting a hand on her chin. “Be, Phoebe Be.”

“I know, it’s a big decision,” said Haxorus. He looked down the other side of the hill, where the older Phoebe and the Gengar were waiting. “Are those two your parents?” he asked.

“Phoe,” said the younger Phoebe, nodding.

“Why don’t you go talk it over with them?” said Haxorus. “I don’t want to take you away from your family unless they’re okay with it, too.”

“Phoebe,” said the younger Phoebe with a nod. She floated back down the hill towards her mother and father, and the two Phoebes and the Gengar spoke with each other for a few minutes.

What did the younger Phoebe decide?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus and Iris found wild Phoebes.

choices: Haxorus trains with Joy and Phoebe.
Haxorus, Iris, Gracie and Phoebe return to Pallet Town.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
After speaking with her mother and father for a few minutes, the younger Phoebe and the wild Gengar hugged each other. After hugging her father, the younger Phoebe turned to her mother, and the two Phoebes embraced each other. Once the older Phoebe let go of her daughter, she reached up to her hair, and plucked the two pink flowers out. She then placed the two flowers in her daughter’s hair, one behind each of the younger Phoebe’s ears. The younger Phoebe nodded, then floated back up the hill to Haxorus and Iris as the older Phoebe and the Gengar held each other’s hands and watched their daughter go.

“Be, Phoebe,” said the younger Phoebe as she approached Haxorus and Iris. “Phoe, Phoebe!”

“You want to come with me?” Haxorus asked.

“Phoebe,” said Phoebe. “Be, Be!”

“You want to battle first?” said Haxorus, and Phoebe nodded and took a battle stance.

“Alright, then,” said Haxorus, grabbing a Pokéball from his belt. “Joy, let’s go!”

Haxorus threw the Pokéball into the air, sending his Joy out in a burst of white light.

“Joy!” said Joy as she came out of her Pokéball.

“Okay, Joy, I want to see what you can do,” said Haxorus. “Are you ready for a battle?”

“Joy,” said Joy, nodding fiercely as she moved into a battle pose and stared down Phoebe.

“Then let’s go!” said Haxorus.

“Joy!”

“Phoebe!”

Phoebe’s shadow started growing longer, and stretched out until it was behind Joy. Phoebe then phased into the ground and travelled through her shadow, and popped back out behind Joy. Phoebe’s hands glowed with dark grey energy, and she hit Joy with a Shadow Sneak attack.

“Joy!” Joy cried out.

“Stop her, Joy!” Haxorus ordered.

“Joy!” said Joy, as her eyes began glowing blue. Blue waves of energy emanated from her eyes and washed over Phoebe. Phoebe blinked her eyes tiredly, then yawned loudly. She tripped over her own feet as she fell backwards, and she was fast asleep before she hit the floor.

“Good work, Joy!” said Haxorus. “Now, attack!”

“Joy,” said Joy, and her eyes started glowing red. A red mist formed around Phoebe, and started streaming towards Joy. The bruise from Phoebe’s Shadow Sneak started to heal up as Joy used Dream Eater on the wild Phoebe.

“Now’s my chance!” said Haxorus as he pulled out an empty Pokéball. “Pokéball! Go!”

He threw the Pokéball at Phoebe, and the Pokéball connected, pulling her into the Pokéball with a red beam of light. The Pokéball dropped to the ground and started rocking back and forth... once... twice... three times...

The Pokéball dinged, and the button flashed, signalling that Phoebe had been successfully caught.

“Alright!” said Haxorus, picking up the Pokéball and holding it above his head. “I caught a Phoebe!”

“Joy! Joy!” said Joy, smiling as she jumped up and down in excitement.

Haxorus opened the Pokéball, and Phoebe came out, still fast asleep.

“Joy,” said Joy as she clasped her hands over her chest, and waves of blue energy emanated from Joy’s body with a sound like a bell being rung. The blue waves from Joy’s Heal Bell washed over Phoebe, and she woke up.

“Joy,” said Joy again, and this time she raised her hands out towards Phoebe. A pink wave of energy flew out from Joy’s hands, and the Heal Pulse travelled over to Phoebe and healed her injuries.

“Phoebe,” said Phoebe with a smile.

“That was a great battle, Joy,” said Haxorus. “You too, Phoebe.”

“Be!” said Phoebe happily.

“Welcome to the team, Phoebe,” said Haxorus.

What did Haxorus do next?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Phoebe wants to join Haxorus' team.

choices: ...maybe having them battle each other will get them to like each other
...maybe I should ask Iris to battle these three to calm them down
...maybe I should spend some time with Phoebe so she will listen to me easier
...maybe I should ask Professor Oak what to do...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus opened the other two PokéBalls he had, letting Beartic, Bisharp, Vanilluxe and Jenny out for a breath of fresh air. "Everyone, I want you to say hello to Phoebe, our newest teammate!" Haxorus announced. Jenny ran over to hug Phoebe, but phased through her and crashed on the ground, causing Phoebe to giggle.

"Jen, Jen Jenny!!" Jenny said as she got up, clearly angry.

"Phoebe Be Phoebe," Phoebe said, a sly smile appearing on her face.

"Sharp!" Bisharp said as she leveled a blade to Phoebe.

"Joy Joy!!" Joy said as she got in the middle of the three quarreling Pokémon.

"Guys, calm down," Haxorus said, rushing over to be at Joy's side. "You're all on the same team, so you need to learn to get along! Phoebe, you can't pull stunts like that with the others if you want them to trust you."

"Phoe Phoebe," Phoebe said with a pout.

Seeing Jenny, Bisharp and Phoebe's hostile looks toward each other, Haxorus thought...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus trains with Joy and Phoebe.

choices: Haxorus and Phoebe battle with one of Iris' Pokémon.
Team Rocket appears to steal their Pokémon!
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus knew that he needed to get Jenny, Phoebe and Bisharp to calm down and get along with each other. Even though Phoebe wanted to be his Pokémon, she still needed to respect her new teammates. He ultimately decided that the best way to do that was to talk with Phoebe.

Haxorus looked over at Jenny and Bisharp, who were still giving Phoebe an angry look.

“Jenny, Bisharp, that’s enough,” Haxorus said.

Jenny and Bisharp reluctantly looked away from Phoebe, though it was clear they were still angry.

Haxorus sighed. “Phoebe, can you come with me for a minute?” he said.

“Be, Phoebe,” said Phoebe.

“Beartic, Joy, you two are in charge until we get back,” Haxorus said.

“Bear,” Beartic growled.

“Joy,” said Joy, nodding.

Haxorus walked away from his other Pokémon, and he could hear Joy and Beartic talking with Jenny and Bisharp. He stopped and turned to face Phoebe, who floated up beside him.

“Be?” said Phoebe.

“Phoebe, you need to be nice to my other Pokémon,” Haxorus said. “You’re going to be working with all of them, so you need to respect them.”

“Phoe, Phoe,” said Phoebe, pouting.

“You like to play pranks like that, don’t you?” said Haxorus. “Phasing through things and surprising people?”

“Be, Phoebe!” said Phoebe, nodding enthusiastically.

“Well, I’m not going to ask you to stop, but I am going to ask you to be careful,” said Haxorus. “Jenny just wanted to say hello, and you let her pass right through you. She could’ve been seriously hurt when she hit the ground.”

“Phoe,” said Phoebe guiltily, looking at the ground in shame.

“I know, you didn’t mean to hurt her, but Jenny doesn’t know that,” Haxorus said. “She only just met you a few minutes ago, remember?”

“Phoebe,” said Phoebe, nodding. She turned and floated over to Jenny. Phoebe returned to her solid state and set herself down on the ground, and walked the last few steps up to Jenny.

“Be, Phoebe Phoe,” said Phoebe. “Phoebe, Phoebe Phoe, Be.”

Once Phoebe finished her apology, she held her hand out towards Jenny. Jenny looked at Phoebe’s hand suspiciously, then her expression softened when she realised Phoebe was being sincere.

“Ny,” said Jenny, taking Phoebe’s hand and shaking it. “Jen Jenny.”

“Phoebe!” said Phoebe happily, smiling as she grabbed Jenny in a hug, much to Jenny’s surprise. Once her surprise wore off, Jenny hugged Phoebe back. That was when Phoebe phased out again, and Jenny’s arms passed through Phoebe.

“Jen?!” asked Jenny in surprise as Phoebe giggled.

“Be, Be, Phoebe Phoe,” Phoebe explained as she floated away from Jenny a little.

“Ny,” Jenny huffed as she crossed her arms, but she seemed to be annoyed, rather than angry.

“Sharp,” said Bisharp, walking up to Phoebe. “Sharp, Bisharp.”

“Phoe,” said Phoebe, returning to her solid state and touching the ground again. “Be?” she said, holding a hand out to Bisharp.

“Bi,” said Bisharp, taking Phoebe’s hand and shaking it.

“Be!” said Phoebe happily.

Haxorus smiled as his Pokémon bonded with each other, then looked around. The wild Gengar and the older Phoebe, his Phoebe’s parents, had left the area. However, Haxorus could still see Gracie, who was walking her Rhyhorn around the area. Iris was also still present, and she had sent out her Dragonite, Excadrill and Emolga, along with Georgia, and her four Pokémon were sparring with each other.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus has a chat with Phoebe.

choices: Haxorus uses the remote on Team Rocket.
Haxorus doesn't use the remote on Team Rocket.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
As Haxorus walked towards her Pokémon, she saw a shadow falling over her, and looked up. She gasped as she saw a giant net flying through the sky. The net fell onto her, and the weights on the outside edge of the net pulled her down, trapping her against the ground. She looked around, and saw her Pokemon were trapped under another net. Iris and her Pokémon were all trapped under a third net, and Gracie and her Rhyhorn were trapped under a fourth net.

“Prepare for trouble, you’re all tangled up!” Haxorus heard a woman saying, and she looked into the sky and saw a hot air balloon shaped like a Meowth floating above them.

“And make it double, we’ll snatch your Pokémon up!” said a man’s voice.

“Seriously? You couldn’t come up with a better rhyme?” asked the woman.

“Well, it’s not like we practice these things ahead of schedule,” said the man.

“Urgh,” groaned the woman. “Let’s just get on with the motto. To protect the world from devastation!”

“To unite all people within our nation!”

“To denounce the evils of truth and love!”

“To extend our reach to the stars above!”

“Jessie!”

“James!”

“Team Rocket blasts off at the speed of light!”

“Surrender now or prepare to fight!”

“Meowth! That’s right!”

“Team Rocket!” yelled Iris. “What are you doing here?!”

“Uh, stealing your Pokémon?” said Meowth. “That’s kinda our thing.”

“You might not be the twerpette we’re looking for, but you are her friend,” said Jessie.

“Yes, knowing her, she’ll rush out here to rescue you as soon as she hears,” said James.

“And then, we’ll snatch up her Pikachu for the boss,” said Meowth. “We might even give him your Pokémon, too.”

“I’m sure he’d would love some Human Pokémon,” said Jessie. “Hey, new twerpette!”

“What?” said Haxorus, confused until she realised that Georgia had never met Team Rocket before. “Are you talking to me?”

“Well, duh!” said Jessie. “We’ll be taking your Jenny, Joy and Phoebe!”

Haxorus struggled against the ropes holding her down. She couldn’t stand up, but she could reach her pocket. Maybe she could use the remote on Team Rocket to try and improve the situation somehow...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Team Rocket appears to steal their Pokémon!

choices: Jessie and James were fused into a single person.
Something else happened to Team Rocket...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Acting quickly, Haxorus reached into her pocket and pulled out the remote. She aimed it up at the hot air balloon and pressed the first button she could get a finger on.

What did the remote do to Team Rocket?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus uses the remote on Team Rocket.

choices: Haxorus' Phoebe escapes and fights Team Rocket.
Ashley and Pikachu arrive to rescue Haxorus and Iris.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
When she pressed the button, there was a bright flash as the remote did its work. Once the light faded from Haxorus’ vision, she slipped the remote back into her pocket before anyone could notice, then looked back up at the hot air balloon. She could only see one person standing in the Meowth balloon now, and it looked like the remote had combined Jessie and James into a single person.

The fusion of Jessie and James had long purple hair that reached down just past her shoulder, and had a slight curl to it. The fusion’s left eye was blue, and the fusion’s right eye was green. The fusion was also wearing the same midriff-baring top and skirt that Jessie had worn, however, the gloves and boots were the ones that had been worn by James.

“I think it’s time we nabbed those Pokémon,” said the fusion of Jessie and James. “Meowth, would you like to do the honours?”

“Sure thing, Jamie!” said Meowth, and he reached up to the console attached to the inside of the basket. Meowth pressed a button, and a hatch opened up on the bottom of the basket. A long mechanical arm stretched out, with a large, rubber coated claw on the end. The claw opened and closed a few times, and Meowth grabbed the joystick to control the arm. The mechanical arm began to move, and turned towards Haxorus’ Pokémon.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Jessie and James were fused into a single person.

choices: Haxorus and Iris decide to return to Pallet Town.
Ashley, Cilan and Pikachu arrive to investigate.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
“Phoebe!” Phoebe yelled. She made herself intangible, causing the net to pass through her, and she began floating up towards the Meowth Balloon. As she rose, phantom images of swords appeared around her and spun through the air, and Phoebe readied herself for battle with her Swords Dance.

“Well, looks like we’ve got someone’s putting up a fight,” said Jamie, picking out a Pokeball. “Woobat, handle this with Air Slash!”

Jamie’s Pokeball burst open, sending out Woobat in a flash of white light.

“Woobat!” said Jamie’s Woobat, flapping his wings. His wings glowed light blue, and he crossed them in front of his body. He then quickly opened them, and light blue saw-like discs of energy shot out and raced towards Phoebe. As the Air Slash discs approached Phoebe, she vanished into a shadowy portal.

“Huh?” said Meowth. “Where’d the Phoebe go?”

“Woobat, keep your eyes open!” said Jamie.

“Woobat!” said Jamie’s Woobat, looking around.

A shadowy portal opened behind Woobat, and Phoebe emerged from the portal.

“Phoebe!” Phoebe yelled as she came out of the portal. She cloaked her hands in ghostly grey energy, then struck Woobat with the full power of her Phantom Force attack, knocking Woobat out of the battle.

“Woobat, return!” said Jamie, holding out a Pokeball. A red beam shot out from the Pokeball and connected with Woobat, pulling the unconscious Pokemon back into the Pokeball. Once Woobat was back in the Pokeball, Jamie put Woobat’s Pokeball away and began reaching for a second Pokeball.

“Let’s see how you handle Amoongus!” said Jamie.

However, Phoebe had no intention of fighting against Jamie’s Amoongus. Her hands were surrounded by dark grey energy once again, but this time, she swung her fists as if she was punching, and ghostly copies of her fists soared through the air towards the balloon. Phoebe’s Shadow Punches hit the Meowth Balloon in the eyes, causing the balloon to explode, flinging Jamie and Meowth into the air.

“I can’t believe that new twerpette beat us!” said Jamie as they started shooting up into the sky.

“It seems to be our lot in life, and so does this!” said Meowth, sailing through the sky with Jamie.

“Looks like Team Rocket’s blasting off again!” Jamie and Meowth yelled together and they flew higher and higher, until they disappeared with a twinkle in the sky.

“Yeah! Great job, Phoebe!” said Haxorus, and all her other Pokemon started cheering for Phoebe as well.

“Be, Phoebe,” said Phoebe, blushing as she floated back to the ground.

“Now, can you get us out of these nets?” Haxorus asked as Phoebe got closer.

“Phoe!” said Phoebe as she reached the ground again. She made herself solid, then knelt down next to Haxorus. She grabbed a handful of the weights on the edge of the net, and lifted them up, allowing Haxorus to get out.

“Thanks,” said Haxorus. “Now, let’s free the others.”

“Phoe!” said Phoebe, and a few minutes later, Jenny, Joy, Bisharp, Vanilluxe and Beartic were free, as were Iris, Georgia, Excadrill, Emolga, Dragonite, Gracie and Rhyhorn.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Phoebe escapes and fights Team Rocket.

choices: One of her old travelling companions.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
“Well, I think that’s enough excitement for one day,” said Iris. “I don’t know about you, but I think I’ll head back to Pallet Town now.”

“Yeah, me too,” said Haxorus as Gracie nodded. “Who was that, anyway?”

“Ugh, that was Jamie, a crook from Team Rocket,” Iris said. “Ash runs into them all the time, and they’re constantly trying to steal his Pikachu.”

“Well, they obviously haven’t succeeded yet,” said Haxorus, as he started returning his Pokémon to their Pokéballs.

“Doubt it’ll stop them from trying,” said Iris as she began recalling her Pokémon as well, leaving out Georgia, who was living Haxorus’ old life in his old body. Iris climbed onto Georgia’s back, and Gracie climbed onto the back of her Rhyhorn. Haxorus returned the last of his Pokémon to their Pokéballs, then climbed onto Rhyhorn’s back behind Gracie.

“Alright, Gracie, back to Pallet Town,” Haxorus said.

“Grace,” said Gracie, stirring her Rhyhorn into motion. Iris also got Georgia moving, and Georgia began walking alongside Gracie’s Rhyhorn, carrying the two Pokémon Trainers and the Human Pokémon back to Pallet Town.

“So, are we still planning on exploring Pallet Town when we get back?” Haxorus asked as Rhyhorn plodded along.

“Nah,” said Iris, shaking her head. “Not today, anyway. I say we get our Pokémon checked out at the Pokémon Centre, then call it a day. We can explore Pallet Town tomorrow.”

“Okay,” said Haxorus, nodding. “Can you take us to the Pokémon Centre, please?” she said to Gracie.

“Grace,” said Gracie with a smile and a nod.

About half an hour later, Gracie’s Rhyhorn had reached Pallet Town, and she steered her Rhyhorn to the town’s Pokémon Centre. They soon arrived at the Pokémon Centre, and Haxorus slid of Rhyhorn’s back as Iris jumped off Georgia’s back.

“Thanks, Gracie,” said Haxorus as Iris returned Georgia to her Pokéball. “Can you wait for us here?”

“Grace, Grace,” said Gracie.

“Thanks again,” said Haxorus. She walked into the Pokémon Centre, and to her surprise, she found Ashley was there, deep in conversation with someone.

Who was Ashley talking to?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus and Iris decide to return to Pallet Town.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content: Which of her old travelling companions was Ashley catching up with?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: One of her old travelling companions.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content: Which of her old travelling companions was Ashley catching up with?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Someone else...

choices: Haxorus uses the remote on May.
Haxorus uses the remote on Max.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
“Hey, Ashley!” said Iris as she entered the Pokémon Centre.

“Oh, hey, Iris! Hey, Georgia!” said Ashley, waving Iris and Haxorus over. As Haxorus walked up to her, she saw that Ashley was sitting with a girl, probably about the same age as him, with brown hair and blue eyes, wearing a red shirt, a red headband, and white shorts over a pair of black bike shorts. Sitting next to the girl was a young boy with dark brown eyes and dark bluish-black hair, wearing a green shirt and a large pair of glasses.

“So, who are your friends?” Iris asked as she walked up to Ashley’s table.

“Iris, Georgia, this is May and Max,” said Ashley. “They travelled with me through Hoenn. May, Max, this is Iris and Georgia, some of my friends from Unova.”

“Hi!” said May, waving at Iris and Haxorus. “It’s nice to finally meet you. Ashley was just talking about you.”

“Yeah, once she got going, there was no stopping her,” said Max, adjusting his glasses.

“Hey, that reminds me, what are you two doing here?” Ashley asked.

“We had a run-in with Team Rocket,” said Haxorus as she took out one of her Pokéballs. “Thankfully, my new Pokémon was able to save the day. Come on out, Phoebe!”

Haxorus opened her Pokéball, and Phoebe appeared in a burst of white light.

“Phoebe,” said Phoebe, smiling.

“Wow, you got a Phoebe!” said Ashley. “That’s your third Human Pokémon in a row!”

May pulled out her Pokédex, and quickly scanned Phoebe.

“Phoebe, the Medium Pokémon,” said May’s Pokédex. “Phoebes use their dancing to communicate with Ghost-type Pokémon, in order to help them pass on. They can also use their dances to summon Ghost-type Pokémon to assist them in battle. Phoebes are often found in graveyards, and other places where people and Pokémon are laid to rest.”

“A dancer, huh?” said May. “I think I could come up with a few interesting Contest routines if I had a Phoebe.”

“Phoe, Be,” said Phoebe, blushing slightly.

“Anyway, we need to get our Pokémon healed up,” said Iris, walking over to the counter. “See you in a bit.”

“Right,” said Ashley, as Haxorus returned Phoebe to her Pokéball. Once she’d returned Phoebe, Haxorus joined Iris at the counter.

“Welcome to the Pokémon Centre,” said Doctor Jules. “How can I help you today?”

“Just a quick check-up,” said Iris, placing her Pokéballs in the tray Doctor Jules provided.

“Of course,” said Doctor Jules. “Joy will have them healed up in no time.”

“Joy Joy!” said the Joy standing next to Doctor Jules.

Haxorus also handed her Pokémon over to Doctor Jules, then followed Iris back over to Ashley, May and Max. Ashley, May, Max and Iris were all distracted by talking to each other. If Haxorus wanted to use the remote on May or Max, now would be a good time to do it...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: May and Max.

choices: May and Haxorus are now sisters.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus pulled out the remote, and pointed it at May. She quickly pressed a button, making sure it was a button she hadn’t pressed before.

What did the remote do to May?

Or was May added to Haxorus' family, meaning she is no longer related to Norman, Caroline and Max?

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content: How much taller does May become?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: May becomes taller.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Once more, there was a flash as the remote did its work. This time, the effects of the remote were immediately obvious to Haxorus. May, who was still sitting at a table opposite Ashley, had shot up in size. Before Haxorus had used the remote, May had been about four and a half feet tall. Now, May was exactly seven feet tall.

Now that she was finished with the remote, Haxorus put the remote back into her pocket, and walked over to Ashley, May, Max and Iris, who had just joined the three.

“So, May, right?” said Iris as she took a seat. “Ashley mentioned you a few times, but he didn’t mention you were so tall.”

“Yeah, well, I had another growth spurt while she was travelling through Unova with you,” said May, blushing with embarrassment. “I really hope I don’t get any taller. It’s getting really hard to find clothes in my size.”

“I’ll say,” said Max. “Wish I was even half as tall as you.”

“No, you really don’t,” said May. “I keep having to duck under doors, and I’m always outgrowing my clothes.”

“So, what brought you two to Kanto, anyway?” said Haxorus as she sat down next to Iris.

“We’re here for the Human Pokémon summit,” said Max. “Professor Birch invited me to come with him as an assistant.”

“Yeah, he’ll be talking about how Human Pokémon have adapted to locations similar to their native habitats in other regions,” said May. “When I heard the summit was going to be in Pallet Town, I decided to meet Max and Professor Birch here after I finished competing in the Johto Grand Festival.”

“That was on at the same time as the Vertress Conference, right?” said Ashley.

“I think so, yeah,” said May. “I guess you were too busy battling to watch the Grand Festival.”

“Yeah, sorry,” said Ashley. “How did it go?”

“I ended up as the runner-up, though I managed to beat Drew in the semi-finals,” said May. “Dawn also made it to the semi-finals, but she was beaten by Lisia.”

“Who’s Lisia?” Haxorus asked.

“She’s a Pokémon Coordinator from Sootopolis City, in Hoenn,” said May. “She managed to beat me in the finals. I think she’s also Wallace’s niece.”

“Wow,” said Ashley. “She must be good if she was able to beat both you and Dawn. Speaking of Dawn, how is she?”

“She’s doing great,” said May. “I’m pretty sure she went back to Sinnoh to visit her family after the Johto Grand Festival.”

Out of the corner of her eye, Haxorus saw the Pokémon Centre’s Joy walking up to their table, carrying two trays full of Pokéballs.

“Joy, Joy Joy, Joy,” said the Pokémon Centre’s Joy as she placed the trays on the table.

“Thanks,” said Iris as she took her Pokéballs. Haxorus also claimed her Pokéballs, and Joy bowed.

“Joy Joy!” she said, then walked back over to Doctor Jules at the counter.

“So, where are you and Max staying?” Iris asked.

“Oh, we’re staying here at the Pokémon Centre,” said May. “Although Ashley did invite us over to her place for dinner.”

“Yeah, I’ll show you guys the way,” said Ashley, standing up. Max, Iris and Haxorus also stood up, then May stood up, towering over the others and dwarfing her little brother. The group followed Ashley out of the Pokemon Centre, and May had to duck so she could make it through the door.

“Grace, Grace!” said Gracie, waving at Ashley as she came out of the Pokémon Centre.

“Hey, Gracie,” said Ashley, waving back. “Thanks for looking after Iris and Georgia.”

“Grace!” said Gracie with a smile. She then spurred her Rhyhorn into motion, and her Rhyhorn began plodding along in the direction of Ashley’s house, followed by Ashley, May, Max, Iris and Haxorus.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: May is now seven feet tall.

choices: They find a store selling clothes for Human Pokémon.
They run into one of Ashley's old friends.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
The rest of the day had passed without incident. Ashley and Gracie led May, Max, Iris and Haxorus back to her house, and later in the day, Dale and Cilan returned from Pallet House, Dale’s restaurant. The group had eaten dinner at Ashley’s house, and after dinner, May and Max headed back to the Pokémon Centre, where they had booked rooms for the next few days. Cilan also headed to the Pokémon Centre, to book himself a room, while Iris and Haxorus stayed in the guest room at Ashley’s house.

That night, Haxorus thought about what she had accomplished during the day. She’d caught a new Human Pokémon, Phoebe, and discovered two new functions of the remote. Haxorus had used the remote on Jessie and James, fusing them into a single person named Jamie. She had noticed that Iris had referred to the fusion, Jamie, using gender neutral pronouns, like they and them. Was Jamie somehow both male and female?

Haxorus’ mind wandered to the other function of the remote she’d discovered today. When she’d used the remote on May, she’d shot up in size, and May was now seven feet tall. As far as May was concerned, her height, while unusual for someone her age, was also completely natural, as May had mentioned having another growth spurt while she was travelling through Johto.

Haxorus frowned, as a strange thought crossed her mind. She realised that, just before Team Rocket had attacked her and Iris, she had started thinking of herself as a girl, rather than as a boy. She knew she was really a male Haxorus, living in a human girl’s life and body. However, nobody was aware of that fact, not even Georgia, who Haxorus had swapped with in the first place.

Maybe it’s a side effect of having a female body, thought Haxorus. The longer I have a girl’s body, the more I’ll start to think like a girl.

That worried Haxorus slightly. He could still remember his old life as Iris’ Axew, before he had found the remote. However, Haxorus was worried that, the longer he stayed in Georgia’s life, the more he’d start to think he was Georgia.

Haxorus yawned, and rolled over in her bed. She supposed it didn’t really matter to her if she called herself Haxorus or if she called herself Georgia. As long as she could still remember how the world used to be before she’d found the remote, she could live with her mind adapting to suit her new body and life. She closed her eyes, and drifted off to sleep.



Haxorus woke up the next morning feeling refreshed and ready to go. She quickly changed clothes, then headed downstairs for breakfast.

Dale had already left to go to work, but Ashley and Iris were still at the table, eating breakfast.

“Morning, Georgia,” said Iris as Haxorus sat down at the table for breakfast.

“Morning, guys,” said Haxorus. “So, what’s the plan for today?”

“Well, after that battle with Team Rocket, we never got around to exploring Pallet Town like we wanted to,” said Iris. “I was thinking we could just wander around town for a while.”

“Don’t forget, we’re meeting up with May and Max for lunch at Pallet House,” said Ashley.

“Right,” said Haxorus. “Hey, Ashley, did you want to come with us?”

“Sure,” said Ashley. “It’s been a long time since I was home. It might be nice to see what’s changed and what’s still the same.”

“Great!” said Iris as she finished her breakfast. “Then let’s go!”

Haxorus and Ashley soon finished their breakfast as well, and soon set off to explore Pallet Town.

What did Ashley, Iris and Haxorus find while exploring Pallet Town?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: The next morning...

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus walked through Pallet Town, looking around in fascination. She’d been in cities and towns before, but that had been as a Pokémon, and she’d usually been in her Pokéball or resting in Iris’ hair. As a human, everything seemed completely different.

“What’s the matter, Georgia?” Iris asked playfully. “Never seen a town before?”

“Oh!” said Haxorus. “Uh, well, it’s just that... everything here’s so different, you know? It’s nothing like Unova.”

“Well, that’s true,” said Ashley. “Everything is still like I remember it, though.”

The three of them continued walking for a few minutes, until Ashley came to a stop.

“Huh,” said Ashley, looking to one side. “That’s new.”

Haxorus looked over at the shop Ashley was looking at. It seemd to be a clothing store of some kind, with mannequins dressed in women’s clothing on display. Strangely, the mannequins were wearing the uniforms that Jenny and Joy had been wearing before Haxorus had turned them into species of Pokemon.

“The Human Pokémon Boutique,” said Iris, reading the sign above the door. “They must sell clothing for Human Pokémon.”

“Come on, let’s check it out,” said Haxorus, and she walked towards the shop, with Ashley and Iris following behind her.

Haxorus walked through the Boutique’s open door, and saw a Sabrina wearing a white tunic with purple trim on the sleeves and a purple belt, as well as a pair of loose-fitting blue pants and matching blue shoes.

“Brina,” said the Sabrina, and she began to change. The Sabrina’s eyes faded from red to an electric blue, and her dark green-black hair darkened to pure black, and began to change shape, shortening to a bob-cut, with two long jagged braids in the front. A pair of white headphones formed over her ears, and a red and white striped antenna popped out on the right side of her headphones, and a blue and white striped antenna popped out of the left side.

“Elesa,” said the Elesa after she finished reversing her Transformation.

“Wow,” said Haxorus. “That was so cool!”

“Sa, Elesa El,” said the Elesa with a bow.

“Ah, thank you, Elesa,” said a voice from behind the counter, and Haxorus saw an older man with a grey beard stepping out of a back room. “Welcome to the Human Pokémon Boutique. My name is Geoffrey. Can I help you today?”

“Actually, yeah,” said Haxorus. She pulled out three of her Pokéballs, and sent out Jenny, Joy and Phoebe. Once the three Human Pokémon had emerged from their Pokéballs, they looked around in wonder.

“Can I buy clothes for my Human Pokémon?” Haxorus asked.

“Of course you can,” said Geoffrey. “We have clothing for every kind of Human Pokémon here. If your Human Pokémon find something they like, Elesa here can Transform into them and try the clothes on, to show your Human Pokémon what they would look like when they wear the clothes they select.”

“Wow, that’s so cool!” said Haxorus. “What do you three say?”

“Jenny!”

“Joy!”

“Phoebe!”

“Okay, then, have a look around,” said Haxorus. “If you see something you like, let me know.”

Jenny, Joy and Phoebe nodded, and the three of them started to wander through the shop, looking for something interesting to wear.

What did Jenny, Joy and Phoebe buy?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: The Human Pokémon Boutique.

choices: Haxorus and her Pokémon leave the Boutique.
Geoffrey has a favour to ask...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
What did Jenny, Joy and Phoebe buy?

After spending some time looking through everything that was available in the Boutique, and asking the store’s Elesa to Transform and show them how to dress themselves, Jenny, Joy and Phoebe eventually made a decision on what they wanted to wear. Once they had their outfits, Haxorus paid for the items, then the three Human Pokémon rushed over to the fitting rooms, giggling with excitement. A few minutes later, Jenny, Joy and Phoebe emerged, dressed in their new outfits.

Jenny was now wearing a red varsity jacket with white trim. The jacket had a side-on picture of a Gyarados head on either side of the zipper, with a full picture of a Gyarados on the back. She wore a black shirt under the jacket, and a short black skirt. Jenny was also wearing a pair of stockings and black boots, and her outfit was completed with a light red cap.

https://www.filb.de/content/anime/dp/036/098.jpg

Joy was wearing a pink and purple furisode with white trim around the neckline and a white obi. There was a light purple floral pattern on the lower part of the furisode, and Joy also wore a pair of purple socks and a pair of black sandals.

https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/8/8d/XY_Furisode_Girl_3.png

Phoebe had found a sky-blue ankle-length dress, with white trim at the top. The dress was decorated with a white floral pattern, and an Alolan Exeggcutor on the left side. Though the dress had come with a lei to be worn on her head, Phoebe had chosen not to wear the lei, preferring to wear the large pink flowers her mother had given her. Phoebe was also barefoot, having chosen not to buy the shoes that came with the dress.

https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/a/a8/VSDancer_SM.png

“Wow, you guys look wonderful!” said Haxorus.

“Jen!” said Jenny as she tried out various battle poses, seeing how well her clothes moved in combat.

“Joy...” said Joy as she blushed and covered her face in embarrassment.

“Be!” said Phoebe, twirling around and dancing as she floated a few inches above the ground.

“Just remember, not all of our clothes can withstand the stress of a Pokemon battle,” said Geoffrey. “However, we do offer free repair services for any battle damage your Human Pokémon's clothes may receive. The Human Pokémon Boutique is here to provide you with all your clothing needs.”

“Thank you so much,” said Haxorus.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Option 1 (Reserved for Shortyboss)

choices: Haxorus does not accept Geoffrey's Elesa.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
“It’s my pleasure,” said Geoffrey. “Oh, and before you go, there is something I’d like to ask you.”

“Oh?” said Haxorus. “What is it?”

“Well, you see, I actually have two Elesas, a pair of sisters,” said Geoffrey, and as he spoke, the second Elesa emerged from a back room. The second Elesa was dressed in a black and blue outfit with a sharp collar and black high heeled boots.

https://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/9/93/...

“While the younger sister is happy to help me in my Boutique, the older sister has become quite restless, I’m afraid,” said Geoffrey. “She wants to join a Pokémon Trainer and see the world and... well, you already have three Human Pokémon. I was hoping you might want to take her with you.”

“Oh,” said Haxorus. “I see.”

What did Haxorus decide?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Geoffrey has a favour to ask...

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
“Well, I’d love to have her, but I already have six Pokémon,” said Haxorus.

“Do you have a Pokémon Storage System account?” Geoffrey asked.

Haxorus frowned as she thought through Georgia’s memories. “No, I don’t think I’ve ever heard of it.”

“Well, the Pokémon Storage System allows you to store your extra Pokémon as electronic data,” said Geoffrey. “You can create a free account using the PC at any Pokémon Centre.”

“Well, in that case, yes, I’ll take your Elesa,” said Haxorus. “That is, if she wants to come with me.”

“El,” said the older Elesa, nodding.

“Sa, Elesa,” said the younger Elesa, walking up to her sister. The two Elesas hugged each other, then the older Elesa walked over to the counter, and picked up an item from behind the counter. Once she picked the item up, she walked up to Haxorus and held the item out. It was a black Pokéball with a red band in the middle, with a red circle on the top half.

“Is that your Pokéball?” Haxorus asked.

“El,” said Elesa with a nod. She reached a hand out and tapped the button on the face of the Luxury Ball, and a red beam pulled her into the Luxury Ball.

“Thank you,” said Geoffrey. “I hope you treat her well.”

“I will,” said Haxorus, nodding. “Thank you again.”

Haxorus left the Boutique, followed by Jenny, Joy and Phoebe, and they met Ashley and Iris outside.

“What kept you?” asked Ashley.

“Well, the shopkeeper, Geoffrey, he wanted me to have one of his Elesas,” said Haxorus, showing Ashley and Iris the Luxury Ball. “I need to go to the Pokémon Centre and sign up for the Pokémon Storage System. Meet you two at Pallet House?”

“Sounds like a plan,” said Iris, and she and Ashley began walking one way, while Haxorus began walking the other.

A few minutes later, Haxorus arrived at the Pokémon Centre, and quickly made her way over to one of the PCs. She found that she could use the computer easily, thanks to skills that had been transferred over from Georgia’s life, and quickly made an account with the Pokémon Storage System. Once she finished registering, Haxorus looked over at the device beside the computer that was designed to teleport Pokéballs from place to place. She knew she wanted to keep Jenny, Joy, Phoebe and Elesa on her team, so she’d have to put either Beartic, Bisharp or Vanilluxe into storage.

Which of her Pokémon does Haxorus put in storage?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus accepts Geoffrey's Elesa.

choices: Used the remote on Juniper and Fennel
Left the remote alone to finish the call
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
"Forgive me, Vanilluxe," Haxorus said as she put her PokéBall on the computer. In a flash of light, the ball disappeared and Haxorus could see a sprite of Vanilluxe on the computer screen.

"Your first time using the PC storage system?" Haxorus heard someone say. Turning around, she saw Doctor Jules (the doctor who replaced Nurse Joy when she became a Pokémon species) looking at her behind the counter, along with Chansey and Joy.

"Yeah...it's so weird. So, my Pokémon's data now?"

"Not exactly," Jules said as he sat down in a chair behind the desk. "When you received your PokéDex, it also registers the PC storage system to that region's lab. That makes it so any Pokémon you catch after the six Pokémon limit gets sent to the that particular lab. So, where did you get your PokéDex?"

"Unova," Haxorus replied after sifting through Georgia's memories.

"Well then, your Vanilluxe is at Professor Juniper's lab. Why don't you give her a call if you're concerned about Vanilluxe?"

"Joy, Joy!" Jules' Joy said, wearing a smile on her face.

"I think I will...but if I may ask, why doesn't your Joy wear clothes?"

"She doesn't feel comfortable wearing clothes, so I don't force her. It all depends on personal taste, I suppose."

Accepting the answer, Haxorus used the phone next to the computer to place a call to Professor Juniper, after looking up her number. When the phone on the other end picked up, Haxorus saw a beautiful woman with brown hair, a white tank top, greek skirt, red sneakers and a lab coat on the other end. "Hello? Professor Juniper here."

"Um, hi, my name's Georgia. I was wondering if you got my Vanilluxe."

"Are you the one who sent this lovely Pokémon?" Juniper asked, motioning to Vanilluxe as she floated up to the screen to see her trainer.

"Hi, Vanilluxe. Sorry, but I got a new Pokémon, and I wanted to spend some more time with her. Could you ever forgive me?"

"Va, Vanilluxe!" Vanilluxe responded with a smile as Juniper got back on the screen. "I think it will be just fine."

"Professor Juniper?" a voice offscreen said as Juniper turned around. Haxorus then saw a woman with long purple hair, a closed lab coat, pink shirt, red glasses and pink hair ornament holding a folder with lots of papers. "Are you ready for the summit next week at Professor Oak's lab?"

"Almost," Juniper replied as Haxorus...
