choices: Cynthia began to tell the story
Diantha began to tell the story.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Before finding her target, Haxorus thought back to when she used the remote on Professors Juniper and Fennel. "This remote made them fall in love with each other, even rewrote history to where they are now married. I wonder what life would be like for the child of two female parents." Acting quickly, she pressed the button on the remote and watched as another female approached her and her new mother Cynthia.

"Cynthia, Georgia; what are you doing here?" the woman said as she approached and embraced Cynthia in a hug.

"I was going to ask you the same thing, Diantha," Cynthia said after kissing her on the lips for a quick second. As the two held each other, Haxorus saw a ring on each woman's fourth finger on their left hands.

"I'm assuming you got some time off of being a Pokémon League champion, as well?" Diantha said with a giggle. She then turned to hug Haxorus. "And how's my little girl doing?"

"Cut it out, Mama!" Haxorus said out of reflex. She then had a quick flash of memory to remember being raised by her Mom (Cynthia) and Mama (Diantha) her whole life. As Diantha and Cynthia started to hold hands, Haxorus asked, "So, how did you two fall in love?"

Cynthia and Diantha blushed as...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Diantha, Champion of Kalos.

choices: Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel arrive.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
“Well, I suppose it all began when we first met, oh, nearly twenty years ago,” said Diantha as she took Cynthia’s hand. “I don’t think we were much older than you are now, in fact.”

“I remember,” said Cynthia, smiling wistfully. “I had just finished travelling through the Sinnoh region for the first time with Gabite, and I wanted to see what another region was like, so I travelled to Hoenn.”

“And I had just finished my first journey through Kalos with Kirlia,” said Diantha. “I was still hungry for adventure, so I travelled to Hoenn as well.”

“We arrived at Lilycove City at around the same time,” said Cynthia. “I was walking through the Lilycove Department Store when I ran into Diantha.”

“We were both stocking up on Pokéballs, as I recall,” said Diantha. “We decided to travel together, as it was the first time either of us had left our home regions.”

“We spent months travelling across Hoenn together, catching Pokémon and collecting Gym Badges,” said Cynthia. “That year, during the Ever Grande Conference, we ended up battling each other in the finals.”

“Whoa, you and Mama battled each other?” Haxorus asked Cynthia. “So who won?”

“Actually, it was a tie,” said Cynthia. “We were both down to our last Pokémon, Gabite and Kirlia. About halfway through the battle, Gabite evolved into Garchomp.”

“Of course, Kirlia couldn’t stand the thought of being outdone by Gabite, so she evolved into Gardevoir just a few seconds later,” said Diantha. “Sadly, neither of our Pokemon were able to get an advantage over the other.”

“In the end, Garchomp and Gardevoir ended up knocking each other out,” said Cynthia. “We both ended up placing in the Top 16 for the Conference that year.”

“Once the Ever Grande Conference ended, though, we ended up going our separate ways,” said Diantha softly. “I was planning on visiting Unova, while your Mom was going to travel through Johto.”

“We parted ways at the same place we met,” said Cynthia. “At the port in Lilycove City. They had just called for boarding, and I was getting ready to leave when Diantha stopped me.”

“That was when I first confessed my feelings to your Mom,” Diantha said as she blushed slightly. “I honestly didn’t know how Cynthia would react to that. I certainly wasn’t expecting her to kiss me.”

“Wow,” said Haxorus. “Really?”

Cynthia giggled as she started to blush as well. “Yes, that’s when your Mama and I had our first kiss.”

“After that, we went our separate ways, though we did send each other letters from time to time,” said Diantha. “While there were a few other women in my life, I never forgot my first love.”

“It was the same for me,” said Cynthia. “I did see a few other women when I was travelling, but it just wasn’t the same as what I felt for Diantha.”

“Aw,” said Haxorus. “So, how did you two meet up again?”

“Well, about ten years ago, at the premiere of one of my films, I learned that the new Champion of the Sinnoh region would be attending,” said Diantha. “I had just become the Kalos Champion myself, so I was looking forward to meeting a fellow Champion. Imagine my surprise when it turned out that the new Sinnoh Champion was actually my childhood friend.”

“Even though it had been nearly ten years since we’d seen each other, we picked things up right were we left off,” said Cynthia. “The first thing your Mama did when she saw me was to leap into my arms and start kissing me like there was no tomorrow.”

“I don’t remember hearing you complaining about it,” said Diantha. “Anyway, after dating each other for about a year, we decided to get married and adopt a child of our own.”

“And that child was me!” said Haxorus, smiling at her Mom, Cynthia, and her Mama, Diantha.

“That’s right,” said Cynthia, smiling at her daughter. “You were still a baby when we adopted you. We never found out what happened to your birth parents, but you were never very interested in finding out about them.”

“No, I’m proud of my Mom and Mama,” said Haxorus, hugging Cynthia and Diantha.

“And we’re proud of you,” said Diantha as she hugged her wife and daughter. “Now, tell me about these Human Pokémon your Mom says you caught recently.”

“I caught a Jenny, a Joy, a Phoebe and an Elesa over the last few days,” said Haxorus excitedly. “I’ve been helping Professor Oak prepare for the summit tomorrow. Oh, that reminds me, I’m supposed to be meeting Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel here at the airport, and taking them to Professor Oak’s lab.”

“Well, I hope you don’t mind if your Mom and I wait for them with you,” said Diantha. “It’s been a while since the three of us were all in the same place together.”

“Sure,” said Haxorus, smiling at her mothers.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Diantha began to tell the story.

choices: Haxorus plays matchmaker with the remote.
Haxorus does something else with the remote.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus scanned the crowd of people in the airport while her Mom and her Mama caught up with each other. As she looked around for Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel, her mind wandered to the recent changes she’d made to her own life. By using the remote, she’d made Juniper and Fennel a married couple with a single button press. Using a different button, she’d made Cynthia, the Sinnoh Champion, her mother, then used the same button to make Diantha, the Champion of Kalos, into her mother as well. By making the two women her mothers, Cynthia and Diantha’s lives were altered so that they were in love with each other, and had adopted Haxorus as a baby. In fact, both Cynthia and Diantha had mentioned that they’d had relationships with other women before they’d gotten married, which meant that the remote had changed them so that they were only interested in women, rather than in men.

Looking over the crowd, an idea began to form in her head. Maybe she could use the remote to make different people fall in love with each other, or even create whole new families with the remote...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Something else happened...

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Making sure that her mothers weren’t watching her, Haxorus pulled out the remote and looked over the crowd. She looked around for people talking with each other, and began using the button that had made Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel fall in love with each other on them.

What were the results of Haxorus’ matchmaking?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus plays matchmaker with the remote.

choices: Haxorus finds Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel.
Haxorus has more questions for Cynthia and Diantha.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Once she was finished, Haxorus put the remote back in her pocket, and looked over her handiwork. She’d used the remote on people she’d recognised from the books and pamphlets she’d read when creating the Human Pokemon a few days ago, since she had some idea about what their lives had been like before she’d altered them

Over to one side, she could see a Pokemon Professor, Kukui, from the Alola region, speaking with another Pokemon Professor. Kukui was speaking to Professor Burnet, a researcher who had been born in Unova, but had moved to the Alola region fairly recently. Earlier, Kukui and Burnet’s discussion had been a more serious one about their scientific work, but now the conversation appeared to be much more romantic in nature, as Kukui leaned over and kissed Burnet on the cheek, making her blush.

A short distance away was a woman with long, meticulously styled blonde hair, talking to a man with a massive mane of red hair. Haxorus recognised the two as Lusamine, President of the Aether Foundation, and Lysandre, the CEO of Lysandre Labs. Lysandre took Lusamine’s hands and leaned down to kiss her. As Haxorus watched the two, she suddenly remembered that the Aether Foundation and Lysandre Labs had been merged into a single company, Aether Laboratories, when Lusamine and Lysandre had gotten married a few years ago.

And finally, Haxorus spotted a man with red hair, wearing a cape. He was Lance, the Champion of the Kanto and Johto regions, and he was holding the hand of another young man, who Haxorus recognised as Steven Stone, the current Hoenn Champion. Steven had recently reclaimed his title as Champion from Wallace, who had become the Champion a few years ago when Steven had stepped down to focus on his geology work. However, thanks to the urging of his boyfriend, Steven had returned as the Hoenn Champion, while Wallace had gone back to work as the Sootopolis City Gym Leader.

Haxorus smiled at the sight of the happy couples she’d created. Everyone seemed to truly care about the people they’d been paired up with, and none of them seemed to be too different from what they had been like before Haxorus had used the remote on them. There were a few changes, of course, but that was to be expected. After all, the remote could change reality itself, so a few minor changes would always be made, so that the changes Haxorus made to the world would make sense.

What does Haxorus do next?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Option 1 (Reserved for Shortyboss)

choices: Haxorus introduces herself to Lillie and Gladion.
Haxorus uses the remote on Lillie and Gladion.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
After double checking that the remote was in her pocket, Haxorus turned her attention back to the people in the airport. Professors Kukui and Burnet were making their way out of the airport, holding hands as they walked. Lance and Steven Stone kissed each other on the lips, then went their separate ways. Haxorus assumed that the two of them both had things they needed to do on their own. Finally, Haxorus turned her attention back to Lysandre and Lusamine. Haxorus hadn’t really noticed before, but Lusamine was accompanied by two children, a boy and a girl, maybe about the same age as Haxorus. She remembered seeing their names mentioned in the books she’d read when she was making Human Pokemon a few days ago, and Haxorus recognised the girl as Lillie and the boy as Gladion. Lillie was tall for her age, likely having inherited her height from her new father, Lysandre. Lillie also had bright red hair, the same colour as her new father’s hair, but she had her mother’s green eyes. Gladion was shorter than his sister, and had his mother’s blonde hair and his new father’s light blue eyes.

Haxorus frowned slightly. She’d seen Lillie and Gladion when she’d first spotted Lusamine, and they had obviously been Lusamine’s children. However, before she’d used the remote, both children had been about the same height, and they had their mother’s blonde hair and green eyes. It seemed that the remote had given Lillie and Gladion some traits from their new father when Haxorus had made Lusamine and Lysandre a couple.

For some reason, Haxorus found that interesting. When she’d made Cynthia her Mom and Diantha her Mama, Haxorus hadn’t been changed physically, but her life and memories were altered so that her Mom and Mama had adopted her as a baby. Well, it was technically Georgia’s life that had been altered, but for all intents and purposes, Haxorus was Georgia. Haxorus wondered why the remote had made her an adopted child, but had physically altered Lillie and Gladion so that they were the biological children of Lusamine and Lysandre. Maybe she could go and talk to Lillie and Gladion for a bit, or possibly even use the remote on the two...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Something else happened...

choices: Used the remote on Lillie and Gladion.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content: Making sure her Mom and Mama were still talking to each other, Haxorus reached into her pocket and pulled out the remote. After checking that Lillie and Gladion weren't looking, Haxorus raised her hand and...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus uses the remote on Lillie and Gladion.

choices: Something else happened to Lillie and Gladion...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content: What happened to Lillie and Gladion?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Used the remote on Lillie and Gladion.

choices: Lillie and Gladion swapped something else...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content: What was swapped between Lillie and Gladion?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Lillie and Gladion swapped something.

choices: Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel arrive.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
When she pushed the button, Haxorus immediately saw that Lillie was now wearing Gladion’s clothes, and Gladion was now wearing his sister’s outfit. Lillie was now wearing a torn black hoodie, with matching black pants, and she was now wearing a pair of red sneakers. Her red hair was now cut short, and her bangs hung over her right eye. Meanwhile, Gladion was wearing a white dress, with matching white shoes and hat, and his blonde hair was now hanging down to his waist, with a braid on either side of his head, resting on his shoulders.

Despite the changes to their outfits, Lillie and Gladion’s personalities seemed to be unchanged, with Gladion crossing his arms and tapping his foot impatiently, while Lillie waited politely next to her mother and father. Just like every other time she’d used the remote, nobody seemed to find anything strange about how Lillie and Gladion were dressed. Haxorus also found it interesting that Lillie and Gladion’s hairstyles had also been swapped. Apparently, when the remote performed a clothes swap, it counted the target’s hairstyle as part of their clothing.

So, the remote can swap lives, bodies, genders and clothing, thought Haxorus. I wonder what else the remote can swap between people?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Lillie and Gladion swapped clothes.

choices: Haxorus and the others arrive at Professor Oak's Lab.
Something else happened on the way...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus slipped the remote back into her pocket. Thankfully, her Mom and Mama hadn’t noticed her using the remote, and Lillie, Gladion, Lusamine and Lysandre hadn’t been looking in her direction when she had used the remote on Lillie and Gladion. Even so, she knew it was safer if others didn’t see her with the remote out. Besides, she still had a job to do. While it had been nice to get a new Mom and Mama, and she’d enjoyed using the remote to create new happy couples, she was at the airport to meet up with Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel.

With the remote secure in her pocket, Haxorus began looking through the crowd again. After a brief search, Haxorus spotted the two women. Professor Juniper was wearing the white tank-top and green skirt she normally wore, but without her usual lab coat. Likewise, Fennel was wearing her usual pink dress, but without her lab coat. The two women were smiling as they walked through the airport, holding hands.

“Excuse me? Professor Juniper? Doctor Fennel?” said Haxorus as she walked up to the two women.

“Oh, hello again,” said Professor Juniper. “You’re the trainer that sent me that lovely Vanilluxe yesterday. Georgia, I believe?”

“Yep, that’s me,” said Haxorus, smiling. “Professor Oak asked me to meet you here at the airport for him, since he’s busy getting ready for the summit.”

“Yes, there’s a lot we still need to get ready for,” said Professor Juniper. “Speaking of which, did you remember to send the Human Pokémon to Professor Oak’s lab?” Juniper asked as she turned to face her wife.

“I did it this morning, before we left. Professor Oak called me to let me know that the Lenoras, Skylas, Elesas, Unovan Jennies and Unovan Joys all arrived safely,” Fennel said, counting off the different Human Pokemon with her free hand.

“That’s good,” said Professor Juniper, before she turned back to Georgia. “Are you planning on coming with us to Professor Oak’s laboratory.”

“Yeah,” said Haxorus with a nod. “I wanna see how preparations for the summit are going.”

“Ah, there you are,” said Cynthia as she and Diantha walked up to Haxorus, Juniper and Fennel. “I was wondering where you’d gone.”

“Sorry, Mom,” said Haxorus, sheepishly. “Oh, Mom, Mama, this is Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel, from Unova. Professor Juniper, Doctor Fennel, this is my Mom, Cynthia, and my Mama, Diantha.”

“Please, call me Aurea,” said Professor Juniper, holding her hand out to Cynthia. “It’s a pleasure to meet you.”

“The pleasure’s mine,” said Cynthia, shaking Professor Juniper’s hand. “I take it you’re here for the summit?”

“Yes, I’m one of the guest speakers,” said Professor Juniper. “Are you two here for the summit as well?”

“We are,” said Diantha as she shook Professor Juniper’s hand. “I was pleasantly surprised to find my wife and daughter waiting here when I arrived.”

“Yes, we’ve both been so busy with our Pokemon League duties, and Georgia’s been on her Pokemon journey,” said Cynthia. “It’ll be nice to have a little time together as a family again.”

“Speaking of family, I’m surprised you didn’t mention that you were the daughter of Cynthia and Diantha,” said Fennel, looking at Haxorus. “Why was that?”

“Oh!” said Haxorus, caught off guard by the question. “Well, I guess I didn’t want special treatment, just because of who my mothers are.” And also because they didn’t become my Mom and Mama until a few minutes ago, Haxorus thought.

“That’s an admirable attitude to have,” said Professor Juniper. “Is that also why you decided to start travelling through Unova, instead of Sinnoh or Kalos?”

“Um, yeah,” said Haxorus. “I mean, I already know about Sinnoh and Kalos. I guess I just wanted something different.”

“Your Mom and I were very proud of you when you set off for Unova,” said Diantha, resting her hand on Haxorus’ shoulder. “We both think you did admirably on your journey.”

“Thanks, Mama,” said Haxorus, blushing at her Mama’s praise.

“Well, I suppose we’d better get going,” said Professor Juniper. “There’s still a lot Fen and I need to do to get ready for the summit tomorrow.”

“If you don’t mind, Di and I would like to go with you,” said Cynthia. “It’s been a while since I’ve visited Professor Oak’s lab.”

“No, I don’t mind at all,” said Professor Juniper. “I’m sure Professor Oak would love to see you.”

“Yeah, and I can show you my new Human Pokémon!” said Haxorus. “They’re all really cool!”

“I’m looking forward to meeting them,” said Cynthia, smiling at her daughter’s enthusiasm.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel arrive.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
“Well, here we are!” said Haxorus, as she led her Mom, Mama, Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel up to Professor Oak’s Laboratory. As the group walked up the hill leading to the front door, Haxorus could see Ashley and some of her Pokémon in a nearby field, helping set up the stage for tomorrow’s summit. She could also see May in the distance, towering over Max and Professor Birch.

As the group approached the laboratory, the front door opened, and Professor Oak stepped out.

“Oh! Hello, everyone,” Professor Oak said. “I wasn’t expecting you to be here so soon.”

“Luckily, there weren’t any delays with our flight,” said Juniper. “Thank you for sending Georgia to meet us at the airport.”

“Of course,” said Professor Oak. “And thank you, Georgia, for agreeing to meet Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel.”

“It was my pleasure,” said Haxorus. “Besides, if I hadn’t gone, I wouldn’t have run into Mom and Mama.”

“Hello again, Professor,” said Cynthia, smiling. “It’s been a while since we last met.”

“It has indeed,” said Professor Oak, shaking Cynthia’s hand. “And it’s good to see you too, Diantha.”

“The pleasure’s all mine,” said Diantha, shaking Professor Oak’s hand. “I’m just glad I was able to take time away from my Champion duties to attend the summit. And you can imagine my surprise when I find that my wife and daughter were waiting at the airport when I arrived.”

“I know,” said Cynthia. “It’s an incredible coincidence, but I’m glad it did happen. It’s been too long since the three of us have spent some time together as a family.”

“Of course,” said Professor Oak, nodding. “Georgia, why don’t you and your parents go out and enjoy yourselves for the rest of the day?”

“Are you sure?” Haxorus asked.

“Oh, yes, I’m sure we can manage without your help,” said Professor Oak.

“Thanks, Professor,” Haxorus said.

“It was nice to meet you in person, Georgia,” said Professor Juniper. “I’ll see you all at the summit tomorrow.”

Professor Oak, Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel all headed inside the laboratory as Haxorus, Cynthia and Diantha headed back towards Pallet Town.

“So, Georgia, I hear you have some new Human Pokémon,” said Diantha.

“Yeah, that’s right!” said Haxorus as she reached into her pockets and pulled out her Poké Balls. “Come on out, girls!”

Haxorus threw three Poké Balls and a Luxury Ball into the air, and Jenny, Joy, Phoebe and Elesa emerged in bright white flashes.

“Team, this is my Mom and Mama,” said Haxorus. “Mom, Mama, this is Jenny, Joy, Phoebe and Elesa. Say hi, everyone!”

“Jen!” said Jenny, saluting Cynthia and Diantha.

“Joy!” said Joy as she bowed.

“Be Phoebe!” said Phoebe, waving.

“Elesa,” said Elesa with a smile.

“Well, this is quite the collection,” said Cynthia. “You weren’t joking about becoming a Human Pokémon Trainer.”

“And I do believe the people attending the summit tomorrow will receive a single Human Pokémon as a gift,” said Diantha. “I wonder what I will choose; a Malva, perhaps?”

“Sa?” said Haxorus’ Elesa, as her skin rippled. Elesa’s headphones faded away, and her black hair changed to a purple colour. Her face’s shape was moulded into a new form as her electric blue eyes darkened to red.

“Malva?” Haxorus’ Elesa asked again, having Transformed into a Malva.

“Well done, Elesa,” said Diantha. “Admittedly, I may end up choosing something else entirely, but at the moment, I am indeed considering picking up a Malva tomorrow. What about you, Cynthia?”

“I was thinking I might try and pick up an Olivia,” said Cynthia.

“Va, Malva,” said Haxorus’ Elesa as she Transformed again. Her skin and eyes darkened to brown, and her purple hair darkened to black and grew shorter, with a single curled bang in the front.

“Li, Via Ol,” said Elesa once she finished her Transformation into an Olivia.

“Excellent work,” said Cynthia. “Mind you, with so many options, it can be hard to choose.”

“Yeah,” said Georgia. “I still have no idea what I might pick tomorrow. I mean, Malvas and Olivias are cool, but so are Plumerias, and Gardenias, and Violas and...”

“Slow down, Georgia,” said Cynthia. “You have plenty of time to make up your mind.”

“I know, I’m just so excited about tomorrow,” said Georgia. “I can’t wait!”
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus and the others arrive at the Laboratory.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
As ‘Georgia’, Cynthia and Diantha made their way through Pallet Town, little did they know that there were a few pairs of eyes on them.

“That’s the new twerpette that beat us earlier,” said Meowth, watching the three from his perch in a nearby tree.

“And she’s the daughter of two Champions!” said Jamie, who was sitting next to Meowth, as they crossed their arms across their chest, just underneath their breasts. “No wonder her Phoebe was able to beat us.”

Jamie had no idea they were technically a few days old, as they had been created when ‘Georgia’ (actually Haxorus) had used the remote to fuse Jessie and James into a single person. Since Jamie was a fusion of a man and a woman, they were actually a hermaphrodite. They were, in fact, currently the only hermaphrodite in the world, and would remain so, unless Haxorus used the remote to fuse more men and women together.

“And she’s picked up another one of those Human Pokémon,” said Meowth. “Been hearing a lot about them lately.”

“That’s no surprise, since there’s a summit about them tomorrow,” said Jamie.

“Hey, that gives me an idea!” said Meowth. “Why don’t we go to the summit tomorrow and pick up a Human Pokemon?”

“That’s... actually, that is a good idea,” said Jamie. “I could do with some more Pokémon, especially since I had to give Woobat, Yamask, Frillish and Amoongus to the boss yesterday.”

“Yeah, we could go and steal all the Human Pokemon and give ‘em to the boss! I’m sure he’d love ‘em!” said Meowth.

“Or I could just go in disguise and get one like every other person at the summit,” said Jamie. “It’d be much easier.”

“Oh,” said Meowth. “Yeah, that makes more sense. Especially since you’re so good at disguises.”

“Yes, well, I kind of have to be,” said Jamie, adjusting their skirt in a futile attempt to hide the distinctive bulge between their legs. “There aren’t many other people like me.”

“Ain’t that true,” said Meowth. “So, tomorrow, we get dressed up, visit the summit, and pick up a Human Pokémon for ourselves! It’s foolproof!”

There was the sound of a Poké Ball opening, and a round, blue Pokémon appeared behind Jamie and Meowth and saluted.

“Wobbuffet!” said Jamie’s Wobbuffet.

“Shh!” Jamie and Meowth hissed, trying to keep Wobbuffet quiet.

“Wobbuffet...” said Wobbuffet sadly.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Later that day...

choices: Haxorus wants to make more Human Pokémon.
Haxorus creates evolutions for the Human Pokémon.
Haxorus decides to go to sleep.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
That evening, Haxorus sat down in her room in the Pokémon Centre. Now that her Mom and Mama had arrived in Pallet Town, Haxorus was now staying at the Pokémon Centre with her recently created family. She’d said good night to her parents, who were staying in the room next door, and her Pokémon were all safely in their Poké Balls, which were currently scattered across the room’s desk.

Satisfied that she was alone, Haxorus reached into her bag and took out the strange remote.

“This little thing is amazing,” said Haxorus as she examined the remote. “It’s got so many crazy powers. I wonder what else it can do?”

Haxorus still found it hard to believe that it had only been a week since she’d found the remote as she went over all the changes she’d made in her mind.

“Okay, this button here causes Pokémon to evolve, and this button over here is the one that turned all those women into Human Pokémon,” said Haxorus, tracing over the buttons in question with her finger. “These buttons are the swapping buttons. I can use them to swap lives, bodies, genders and clothes. And these buttons here are the ones I used to create all those new relationships. This one here is what made Cynthia and Diantha my Mom and Mama, this one made Juniper and Fennel a couple, and this one made Iris and I friends.” Haxorus paused. “Well, it technically made Iris and Georgia friends, but since I’m Georgia now...”

Haxorus shrugged, then moved onto the next few buttons. “Anyway, this is the button that made May grow so tall, and this is the button that fused Jessie and James together.”

Once she’d finished going over all the things she’d done with the remote so far, Haxorus noticed that there was still a number of buttons she hadn’t tried yet, but that was okay. She knew she’d have plenty of opportunities to use the remote in the future.

Haxorus then found her mind wandering to the Human Pokémon she’d created a few days ago. Eighteen women had been transformed into species of Pokémon, and nobody noticed the huge difference in the world. In fact, Haxorus had already caught four different species of Human Pokemon, and she was looking forward to receiving a fifth tomorrow at the Human Pokémon Summit.

While she was thinking about Human Pokémon, a few ideas popped into her mind. Her first idea was to create more Human Pokémon. Of course, since all the Human Pokémon she’d created so far were women, maybe it was time to turn some men into Human Pokémon, so that the male and female Human Pokémon could act as counterparts to each other.

Haxorus’ second idea involved the evolution button. She was curious what would happen if she used the evolution button on a Pokémon that didn’t have an evolution. Given that the remote had the ability to turn humans into Pokémon, it would almost certainly create new Pokémon. But would Haxorus have any control over what sort of Pokémon those evolutions would be? And what sort of evolutions would the remote create for the Human Pokémon?

Haxorus then yawned, and looked out through the window. The sun had set over Pallet Town, and the moon was slowly rising in the night sky. It had been an exciting day today, and tomorrow would be even more exciting. Maybe she should just go to bed...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: That evening...

choices: Haxorus has an idea for Jenny's evolution.
Haxorus lets the remote make Jenny's evolution.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus took out her Pokédex, and looked up Jenny’s entry.

“Jenny, the Justice Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Jennies will give their lives to defend those they have sworn to defend, and cannot tolerate criminals and bullies. Their incorruptible morality has resulted in Jennies being used in police forces around the world. Jenny does not have an evolution.”

“I think it’s time to change that,” said Haxorus as she aimed the remote at the image of Jenny in the Pokédex.

Does Haxorus try to come up with her own ideas for Jenny’s evolution, or does she just let the remote do its work without her input?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus creates evolutions for the Human Pokémon.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Before she pushed the evolution button, Haxorus had an idea. When she’d created the Human Pokemon, she’d simply let the remote work for itself. The remote had taken each woman’s personality and abilities and converted them into the traits for a Pokemon. What Haxorus wanted to know was if she could influence the way the evolutions were created.

What ideas did Haxorus have for Jenny’s evolution?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus has an idea for Jenny's evolution.

choices: The remote works, using Haxorus' suggestions.
The remote doesn't work as intended.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
After thinking it over for a few minutes, Haxorus finally came up with an idea for Jenny’s evolution.

“When Jenny evolves, she grows a second pair of arms,” Haxorus said quietly. “And Jenny also gains the Grass type.”

After saying her ideas out loud, Haxorus aimed the remote at the picture of Jenny in her Pokédex and pressed the button. What happened?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Option 1.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
The remote flashed for a second, blinding Haxorus as it worked. When the bright light faded, Haxorus looked at her Pokédex, and saw that a new Pokémon had been registered. Haxorus selected the new Pokémon, and her Pokédex displayed an image of Jenny. However, this picture of Jenny was different. This Jenny appeared to be about six inches taller, and a lot more muscular. She also had a second pair of arms, right below her original pair. Haxorus could also see flowers growing in Jenny’s teal hair, and the flowers were the same amber colour as Jenny’s eyes.

“Jennyfir, the Guardian Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokedex. “Jenny evolves into Jennyfir when it comes into contact with a Moss Rock. A Jennyfir’s protective instincts will lead to her becoming a protector for all Pokemon living in the forest she evolves in. However, when two Jennyfirs are in the same forest, the two will fight to determine who has the right to defend the area. The losing Jennyfir will leave to find a new territory to claim as her own. Jennyfir is a Fighting and Grass type Pokémon, native to Kanto. Unovan, Kalosian and Alolan forms of Jennyfir have also been discovered.”

“Yes! It worked!” Haxorus said with a giggle. The remote had taken Haxorus’ suggestions for Jenny’s evolution, and used them to create a new species of Human Pokémon. Jenny’s new evolved form, Jennyfir, looked amazing.

With the remote in one hand, and her Pokédex in the other, Haxorus then began scrolling through her Pokédex. Whenever she found a Human Pokémon, she said the first few ideas that came to her mind, then she pressed the evolution button. The remote would then take her suggestions and use them as guidelines for the new Human Pokémon evolutions it created. After a few more minutes of this, Haxorus had finished creating her new Human Pokémon evolutions.

What sort of Human Pokémon evolutions did Haxorus create?
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: The remote works, using Haxorus' suggestions.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Once Haxorus was finished, she put the remote back in her back, then used her Pokédex to check out the new evolved forms for the Human Pokémon she’d just created.

First was Joy’s evolved form. The evolved form of Joy was slightly taller, and had a pouch on her stomach that could hold Pokémon eggs or baby Pokémon. Her pink hair was now much longer, and reached down to the floor.

“Joyous, the Nursing Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Joy evolves into Joyous when she forms a strong bond with her Pokémon Trainer. Joyous are rare in the wild, as very few can form the strong friendship that is required for evolution. A wild Joyous’ maternal instincts will lead to her finding abandoned Pokémon eggs and placing them in her pouch until they hatch. Joyous will also fight fiercely to defend their adopted children. Joyous is a Fairy and Normal type Pokémon, native to Kanto. Unovan, Kalosian and Alolan forms of Joyous have also been discovered.”

Once Haxorus was finished reading Joyous’ entry, she moved onto the next Human Pokémon, Sabrina. Sabrina’s evolved form had a second head, next to her original head. As a result of her second head, Sabrina’s evolved form also had wider hips and shoulders, to better support the extra weight. Her height was unchanged, but her hair was now very different. On her left head, her black hair was slightly longer than shoulder length, while on her right head, her hair reached down to her knees. The hair on both her heads was now formed out of solid ice.

“Sabrigid, the Frost Witch Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Sabrina evolves into Sabrigid when it comes into contact with an Ice Rock. After evolving, Sabrigid will never visibly or audibly express any emotions. The only time a Sabrigid will let her guard down is if she is with people or Pokémon she trusts completely, or if she is alone. Anyone who stumbles upon a wild Sabrigid that is expressing herself will be frozen solid. Sabrigid is a Psychic and Ice type Pokémon, native to Kanto.”

When she was done checking Sabrigid’s data, Haxorus then brought up the next Human Pokémon on her list, Karen. Unlike the other Human Pokémon evolutions, Karen’s evolved form didn’t have any new body parts. Instead, Karen’s body was composed entirely of solid white marble, including her eyes and hair.

“Karenore, the Statue Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokedex. “Karen evolves into Karenore when she is groomed to increase her beauty. After evolving, a Karenore believes her beauty will last forever as a marble statue. Wild Karenores will often gather in clearings and stand completely still in various poses, forming statue gardens. If anyone else enters their statue garden, the Karenores will come to life and pummel the offender. Karenore is a Dark and Rock type Pokémon, native to Johto.”

After she finished reading Karenore’s page, Haxorus moved onto Clair’s evolution. Clair’s evolution had a mermaid’s tail instead of legs, and her mermaid’s tail was covered in blue scales that matched the colour of her hair. She also had visible gills along the side of her ribcage.

“Clairmaid, the Mermaid Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Clair evolves into Clairmaid during a rainstorm. Wild Clairmaids live under the surface of underground lakes, and only return to the surface to lay their eggs. Even though they live underwater, Clairmaids are far from helpless when they are on land. Clairmaids can instinctively tame any Dragon or Water type Pokémon that enters their lakes, even Clairs and other Clairmaids. Clairmaid is a Dragon and Water type Pokémon, native to Johto.”

When she had finished checking the information from Clairmaid, Haxorus moved onto the next Human Pokémon evolution, which was Jasmine’s evolved form. Jasmine’s evolved form was composed entirely of a silvery liquid metal, except for her hair, which was bright yellow and crackled with electricity.

“Jasmercury, the Liquid Metal Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Jasmine evolves into Jasmercury when she is in a special magnetic field. A Jasmercury’s liquid body allows her to flow around attacks, making her capable of taking much stronger blows. The electrical energy stored in Jasmercury’s hair is what allows a Jasmercury to retain her human shape. When a Jasmercury’s electrical reserves are depleted, she will become a shapeless blob until she can recharge. Jasmercury is a Steel and Electric type Pokemon, native to Johto.”

After reading Jasmercury’s entry, Haxorus then read the information about Phoebe’s new evolution. The evolved form of Phoebe was surrounded by a soft halo of pink light, and Phoebe’s legs had merged together into a wisp of pink smoke.

“Phoebrite, the Guiding Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Phoebe evolves into Phoebrite during the daytime. Phoebrite use their dances to guide lost souls to their final resting place. Phoebrites will wander far and wide in order to assist as many lost souls as they can. At night, wild Phoebrites will dance through the sky, illuminating the night with their glow. Phoebrite is a Ghost and Fairy type Pokémon, native to Hoenn.”

Following Phoebrite was the entry on Shelly’s evolution. Instead of legs, Shelly’s evolution had eight octopus tentacles, the same colour as her hair. She also had gills on the side of her neck.

“Shellopod, the Octopus Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Shelly evolves into Shellopod when she is groomed to increase her coolness. A wild Shellopod will move into the wreckage of a sunken ship and claim it for her own. Shellopods can use their ability to phase through walls to pass through the corridors of their sunken homes at will. Sailors will often tell of hearing the haunting songs of Shellopods singing to each other during stormy weather. Shellopod is a Water and Ghost type Pokémon, native to Hoenn.”

When she was done with Shellopod’s entry, Haxorus then started reading about Gardenia’s evolution. The evolved form of Gardenia had bark for skin, and roots were growing out of her feet. The hair on Gardenia’s evolution was composed of vines that were covered in leaves and flowers, and the flowers were actually composed of orange flames.

“Gardember, the Flower Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Gardenia evolves into Gardember during harsh sunlight. Gardembers overcome their fear of Ghost type Pokémon by blasting them with fire from their new flowers. During the night, Gardembers will bury their feet and take root while they sleep standing up. Before they take root, a Gardember will burn a small patch of grass, and will absorb nutrients from the ashes while she sleeps. Gardember is a Grass and Fire type Pokémon, native to Sinnoh.”

Haxorus finished up with Gardember’s entry, then started reading the next entry, which was about Candice’s evolution. The evolved form of Candice had a body composed of solid ice, and a pair of long icy fangs emerged from her mouth.

“Canditox, the Passionate Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokedex. “Candice evolves into Canditox during a hailstorm. Wild Canditoxes will stalk their prey during a snowstorm, using their icy bodies to blend in with the snow. A Canditox’s venom is cold as ice, and will slow the victim down while the poison takes effect. Despite their icy appearance, Canditoxes have warm and friendly personalities, and will take great pride in something they care greatly about. Canditox is a Poison and Ice type Pokémon, native to Sinnoh.”

So far, Haxorus was very impressed with the evolutions she’d created. The remote had used all of her suggestions and worked them into the Human Pokémon evolutions she’d created in ways that seemed to make sense with the information that already existed about the Human Pokémon. Haxorus had greatly enjoyed reading about the Human Pokémon evolutions from Kanto, Johto, Hoenn and Sinnoh, and she looked forward to reading about the Human Pokémon evolutions from Unova, Kalos and Alola.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Human Pokémon Evolutions, Part 1.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Now that Haxorus had finished reading about the evolutions of the Human Pokémon from Kanto, Johto, Hoenn and Sinnoh, she then moved onto the first Unovan Pokémon listed in the Pokedex, which was Elesa. Elesa’s new evolved form did not have arms, legs or neck, and her head, hands and feet were levitating with psychic power. There was a second picture of Elesa’s evolution in her Charged Form, and the Charged Form of Elesa’s evolution had her hands, feet and neck connected to her body by electricity that formed the shape of her arms, legs and neck.

“Elesper, the Fashionista Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Elesa evolves into Elesper when she is groomed to increase her smartness. Elesper moves her detached hands, feet and head with her psychic power, and her detached body parts are tethered to her body with electricity when Elesper enters her Charged Form. Wild Elespers use their psychic powers to craft their own clothing out of whatever materials they can find, and will perform fashion shows for Pokemon Trainers they encounter. Elespers have the ability to Transform into other Human Pokémon, and also have the ability to mimic the appearance of Pokémon Trainers that they have met. Elesper is an Electric and Psychic type Pokémon, native to Unova.”

After she finished reading Elesper’s entry, Haxorus then started to read the entry for Skyla’s evolved form. Skyla’s evolution had wings instead of arms, and the feathers on her new wings were red, the same colour as her hair, which was now also composed of feathers. Her legs were now like those of a bird, with four toes facing forward and one toe facing backwards. Light blue scales covered her bird legs, which matched the colour of the ornament in Skyla’s hair.

“Skyrun, the Aerobatic Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Skyla evolves into Skyrun while she knows the move Drill Run. Skyruns are just as comfortable on the ground as they are in the sky, and can run or fly at incredible speeds. However, wild Skyruns prefer to remain airborne, and will never set foot on the ground unless they absolutely have to. Skyruns are very proud of their combat ability, but have also learned not to underestimate their opponents. Skyrun is a Flying and Ground type Pokémon, native to Unova.”

When Haxorus finished with Skyrun’s information, she moved onto the data for Lenora’s evolution. Lenora’s evolved form was slightly more muscular, and had much longer blue hair. The hair was wrapped around Lenora’s body, arms and legs, forming a layer of armour.

“Lenarmor, the Defender Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Lenora evolves into Lenarmor when she is groomed to increase her toughness. A Lenarmor’s hair is made of steel, and she uses her hair to protect herself during battle. A wild Lenarmor’s defensive instinct will lead to her protecting a large area, as well as the Pokémon living in that area. A Lenarmor that is raised inside a city will consider everything and everyone within the city’s limits to be under her protection. Lenarmor is a Normal and Steel type Pokémon, native to Unova.”

Now that she was finished learning about the Unovan Human Pokémon evolutions, Haxorus loaded up the entry for the first Kalosian Human Pokémon, which was Viola. Viola’s new evolution now had large butterfly wings emerging from her back, and her eyes were now solid green, and appeared to be made of thousands of tiny hexagons.

“Violarty, the Artist Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Viola evolves into Violarty when she is groomed to increase her cuteness. The pattern on Violarty’s wings is unique for each individual, and is influenced by the environment around her when she evolves. Violarties generate a pigment from their wings, and use this pigment to paint patterns in the sky while flying. A Violarty’s compound eyes allows her to see things in much greater detail, allowing her to paint with very fine details that most people cannot see. Violarty is a Bug and Flying type Pokémon, native to Kalos.”

Once Violarty’s entry finished playing, Haxorus loaded up the entry for Malva’s new evolution. Malva’s evolved form had hair that was composed of pure fire, including her eyebrows. Malva’s evolution also had sharp pink teeth, as well as long pink claws on her hands and feet.

“Malvicious, the Grudge Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Malva evolves into Malvicious during the nighttime. A Malvicious’ perfect memory allows her to remember every insult or joke that is made at her expense. Wild Malviciouses will eventually hunt down anyone who makes fun of them, no matter how far they must travel. Journalists often take a Malvicious with them, both for defence and for their perfect memories, which allows them to act like a living camera. Malvicious is a Fire and Dark type Pokémon, native to Kalos.”

After Malvicious’ entry was complete, Haxorus then moved onto the entry about Grace’s evolved form. Grace’s new evolution was interesting, as she had a second torso stretching out from her backside and ending in a second pair of hips. Grace’s evolution essentially looked like a centaur composed entirely out of human body parts.

“Graceful, the Ride Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Grace evolves into Graceful while she knows the move Double Kick. A Graceful’s experience riding Pokémon allows her to provide a smooth ride when she herself is ridden. Graceful’s four legs and strong back means she can carry large loads without much difficulty, which has led to many Gracefuls being used to ferry people and cargo. In battle, a Graceful will rear up on her hind legs, and use her front legs to kick at her opponent. Graceful is a Ground and Fighting type Pokémon, native to Kalos.”

With all the Kalosian Human Pokémon evolutions done, Haxorus then moved onto the last two, which were from Alola. First was Plumeria’s evolved form. In her new evolution, Plumeria’s four long braids had become snakes, with two pink snakes at the front and two yellow snakes at the back. Plumeria’s legs had also fused together and stretched out into a long snake tail, with pink scales and yellow S shaped markings along the sides of her snake tail. She also had two pink fangs poking out of her mouth.

“Plumedusa, the Serpent Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Plumeria evolves into Plumedusa while she knows the move Dual Chop. A Plumedusa’s angry glare is so terrifying the opponent will be frozen in fear, giving her the chance to strike with her serpentine hair or snake-like body. Wild Plumedusas act ferocious, but this is only because their vicious appearance scares people away. Plumedusas are very friendly towards people who approach them without fear, even complete strangers. Plumedusa is a Poison and Dragon type Pokémon, native to Alola.”

Once she was finished with Plumedusa, Haxorus then brought up the entry for the final Human Pokémon, Olivia. Olivia’s new evolved form did not have human legs. Instead, from the hips down, Olivia’s body was composed entirely of rocks, and these rocks had formed into a huge spider’s abdomen, which appeared to have small caves and crevices throughout it. Olivia also had eight spider-like legs attached to her spider abdomen, which were also created out of rocks.

“Olivisect, the Hive Pokémon,” said Haxorus’ Pokédex. “Olivia evolves into Olivisect during a sandstorm. Olivisects protect other Pokémon from sandstorms by allowing them to take shelter within the small crevices in their abdomens. Their experience at navigating rocky mountains allows them to travel quickly over harsh terrain. In battle, Olivisects can also shoot webbing from their hands or their spider abdomen to trap their opponents for the finishing blow. Olivisect is a Rock and Bug type Pokémon, native to Alola.”

When the last entry finished playing, Haxorus turned off her Pokédex and put it away. She was in awe at her new creations. It was amazing how the remote had created whole new Pokémon species for each of the Human Pokémon to evolve into. She wondered if the new evolutions she had created would appear at the Human Pokémon summit tomorrow. She was so excited to learn more about the Human Pokémon and their evolutions tomorrow, as well as spending more time with Cynthia and Diantha, her Mom and Mama. She might even find a few more opportunities to use the remote... unless she wanted to continue using the remote now...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Human Pokémon Evolutions, Part 2.

choices: Haxorus and her family arrive at the Human Pokémon summit.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus yawned, and tucked the remote back into her bag. She’d had her fun, and now it was time for her to get some sleep. Once she was satisfied that the remote was safely hidden away, Haxorus turned off the lights and climbed into bed.



The next morning, after waking up, Haxorus headed downstairs to join her new family in the lobby of the Pokémon Centre. As she walked down the stairs, she spotted Cynthia and Diantha holding hands as they talked to each other.

“Good morning, Georgia,” said Diantha as she saw Haxorus approach.

“Hi, Mama,” said Haxorus. “Hi Mom.”

“Morning, sweetie,” said Cynthia, smiling at Haxorus. “Ready for the summit today?”

“Yep!” said Haxorus with a big grin. “I can’t wait to see all the Human Pokémon!”

“Ah, the enthusiasm of youth,” said Diantha. “Remember when we were that age, dear?”

Cynthia laughed. “You make it sound like it was so long ago,” she said.

“Well, time certainly flies when you become a mother,” said Diantha. “It seems like only yesterday that we signed the adoption papers...”

“Mama...” Haxorus groaned, feeling her face flush with embarrassment.

“Well, if you’re done embarrassing our daughter, we should probably get ready for the summit,” said Cynthia as she stood up. Diantha and Haxorus also stood up, and the three of them headed off.

choices: Haxorus decides to experiment with the nudity button.
Professor Juniper and Doctor Fennel arrive.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
When Haxorus pressed the button, the change to Cynthia was immediately obvious. She was now completely naked, without even her hair ornaments in place. Haxorus frowned, and looked at the remote. Her thumb was definitely not on the button that created Human Pokémon, she was sure of that. She looked back up at Cynthia, and noticed that she was still had her luggage with her, except the bag was now much smaller. She still seemed to act like a regular human, rather than a Human Pokemon, and nobody seemed to care that Cynthia was completely naked.

“Huh,” said Haxorus softly as she put the remote back in her pocket. It seemed like the button she had just pressed made it so that the person it was used on wouldn’t bother with any clothes at all, despite still being a regular human. Haxorus slowly started walking over towards Cynthia, hoping to find out more. As she did so, she saw a young boy, probably only about four or five years old, walking with his mother. The mother and child duo walked past Cynthia, and the young boy was staring at Cynthia with his eyes wide.

“Excuse me,” said the boy, getting Cynthia’s attention. “Why aren’t you wearing any clothes?”

“What have I told you about asking people questions like that?” said the boy’s mother.

“Oh, it’s alright,” said Cynthia, kneeling down so she was at eye-level with the young boy. “I’ve gotten used to it. And to answer your question, I don’t wear clothes because I’ve never been able to find clothes that feel right.”

“What do you mean?” the boy asked.

“Well, you know how you don’t like wearing clothes that are too small, or too big?” said Cynthia, and the young boy nodded. “Well, to tell the truth, every piece of clothing I wear feels like that, even when it’s designed to fit me.”

“Is that why you don’t wear clothes?” said the boy.

“That’s right,” said Cynthia. “And since I’ve never been able to find any comfortable clothes, I decided it would be easier to simply not wear any. Besides, Human Pokémon don’t wear clothes if they don’t want to.”

“Yeah, but those are Pokemon,” said the boy.

“But they still look like human women,” said Cynthia. “If it’s alright for Human Pokémon to not wear clothes if they don’t want to, then it’s alright for humans to not wear any clothes as well.”

“I guess,” said the young boy.

“I’m so sorry about this,” said the boy’s mother.

“It’s fine,” Cynthia said, standing back up. “I don’t mind.”

“Thank you,” said the mother. “Now come on, we’re going to be late for lunch.”

“Okay,” said the young boy, who dutifully followed his mother as she walked away.

Haxorus had been eavesdropping on the conversation, and found Cynthia’s justification for not wearing clothes to be interesting. She found it interesting that Cynthia justified her lack of clothes by using Human Pokemon as an example. That made Haxorus wonder if there were now other people who no longer wore clothes, to further justify Cynthia’s nudity...
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Cynthia is now completely naked.

After seeing Elesa Transform into the different outfits they had chosen, Jenny, Joy and Phoebe excitedly rushed to the changing room to put on the new outfits. Haxorus paid Geoffrey for the outfits as the three Human Pokémon emerged to show off their new outfits.

Jenny now wore a black sports bra, black workout pants that went halfway down her lower legs and black sneakers. A PokéBall symbol was on the front of the bra and on the left thigh of the pants. http://www.herstylecode.com/wp-content/u...

Joy had decided to put on a white nurse's outfit, with a dress that went halfway down her upper legs, white stockings, white low-heel shoes and a white nurses cap. Joy giggled when she went to Elesa, who had Transformed to look like her, liking how cute she looked. https://shop.r10s.jp/coscommu/cabinet/im...

Phoebe put on a red bra-like top with silver accessories, a floor-length skirt with silver accessories at the top, a silver arm band on her left arm, a cloth arm band on her right arm, a silver necklace and a silver headband. She kept the flowers her mother gave her behind her ears. https://ae01.alicdn.com/kf/HTB1RYE3lgfH8...

"You all look so great!" Haxorus said as her Pokémon approached.

"Jen, Jenny!" Jenny said as she assumed a pose that signaled she was ready for a fight.

"Joy..." Joy said as she blushed and shuffled in place.

"Phoe Phoebe!" Phoebe said as she started floating in the air.

"If your Pokémon ever want a change of clothes, please come in again," Geoffrey said as his Elesa assumed her natural form and stood next to him. "There are boutiques all over the world and every one of them are happy to dress up your Human Pokémon."

"Sure, but quick question: If the Pokémon are battling, what's to stop the outfits from being ruined?" Haxorus asked.

"Well..."

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Smiling, Haxorus returned her Joy and her Phoebe to their Pokeballs. "You both did great. Take a nice rest."

"You did great too," Said Iris. "You've caught three new Pokemon already."

"Thank you," Haxorus beamed. <i>I'm really getting the hang of being a Pokemon Trainer. No wonder so many humans do this. It's a lot of fun! Maybe Pallet Town has a bunch of other human things I can do,</i> She thought to herself. Haxorus turned back to Iris and said, "Let's go back to Pallet Town! I want to see it a bit more."

Iris nodded, "I'd like to see it a bit more too. Let's go, Georgia."

~~

"Thanks for all your help, Gracie!" Haxorus said as she and Iris parted ways from Gracie.

"Grace-Gracie!" Gracie replied back, leading the Rhyhorn back to Professor Oak's Laboratory. As she left, Iris dismounted her Pokemon, who was once Georgia but was now her Haxorus, and returned her to her Pokeball. "Last one to Pallet Town's a rotten Exeggcute!" She yelled playfully, running at full speed.

Haxorus struggled to keep up; Georgia's body wasn't as accustomed to running as Iris was. <i>I'm going to need to exercise to run as fast as Iris,</i> Thought Haxorus. <i>That, or find a way to use the remote to help me.</i>

~~

Haxorus looked around. Pallet Town was small, but Haxorus had never had a chance to look at a city like this. As Axew, he had usually been resting in Iris' hair or in his own Pokeball. But now here she was, walking around, surrounded by other humans and the buildings of Pallet Town.

"Wow, Georgia, you look like I've never seen a town before," Iris teased playfully.

Haxorus flushed with embarrassment, "Oh, uh, well, I've never seen this place before. It's really different."

"Well that's true," Iris replied.

"Should we ask Ashley to show us around?" Haxorus asked.

Iris laughed and smiled, "Come on, Georgia. Let's just explore ourselves. That'll be more fun!"

Haxorus smiled. As Axew, he and Iris had been close. But now as Georgia, they were best friends and equals. "Yeah! Let's go!"

The two of them ran deeper into Pallet Town, going as they pleased.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus, Iris, Gracie and Phoebe return to Pall...

choices: Haxorus uses the remote. (Results A - Reserved for SlipshodSliver)
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
It was only a few minutes into their exploration that Iris and Haxorus came upon a restaurant called Pallet House. The smell of hot wings and fries was in the air, caressing Haxorus' nose. "Hey Iris, I want to see what's in there," Haxorus said. "Can we go, please?"

"Of course!" Iris replied.

The two walked into Pallet House. It was full of men watching sports on big screens, eating in-between plays and during commercials. Iris and Haxorus looked around. "There's no tennis on," Iris noted.

"Um. Maybe they don't like tennis?" Haxorus asked.

"I'll ask about it," Iris decided. She approached a counter. "Hello. Do you know where the tennis TV is?"

The female cashier replied, "I'm sorry, miss. We don't play tennis on these screens."

Iris furrowed her brow, "Why not? I'd like to see tennis please."

"I guess I could ask our manager," The cashier headed towards the back.

"Um... Iris... is this okay?" Haxorus wondered out loud.

Iris shrugged, "The worst they can do is say no."

"I guess that's true," Haxorus replied.

The cashier came back with the manager, who smiled on seeing Iris, "Oh hello Iris. Hello, Georgia. Nice to see you here."

"Oh, hi Dale!" Iris said. "You run this place?"

"I sure do," Dale answered. "I don't normally get requests for tennis around here, but I'll see what I can do."

Iris smiled, "Thanks a lot. How's Cilan doing?"

Cilan peeked out from the kitchen, giving Iris and Haxorus a wave before getting back to work.

"He's helping out and having fun," Dale replied. "He says he's not used to this kind of restaurant, so it's a new experience for him. It's great to have him; he really knows what he's doing."

Haxorus looked around. <i>I'm still new to this being a human thing, but it's like this whole restaurant is for boy humans? I didn't even know eating places could be like that.</i> She saw that Iris was looking at the cashier and Dale while the two had their backs turned, and all the customers were either eating or watching. Haxorus began to wonder if she should use her remote at a time like this.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Iris and Haxorus run into Dale and Cilan.

choices: "Let's go back to Professor Oak's Laboratory."
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Within a few moments, Haxorus had pulled out her remote, aimed it at Delia, pushed two buttons, and put the remote away again.

The first button had been the same button Haxorus had used to switch Ash's gender with their parent's. Now it switched Dale's gender with the cashier next to them, turning the cashier male and changing Dale back to a Delia. The second button had been a new one, chosen at random, but Haxorus made sure to remember what it was.

Having used and put away the remote, Haxorus looked around. The restaurant had changed. The TVs were gone, windows to the outside in their place. The men and their meals had been replaced with families at large tables. The decor was a lot brighter now. Wow, changing Ash's mom back really changed things here, Thought Haxorus. That's really neat. Haxorus's thoughts were interrupted by a realization. Nothing happened when I pressed the button the second time. That's strange. Is the remote broken?

The now male cashier turned back to them and asked, "Would you like to eat something while your friend works in the back?"

Iris shook her head, "No thanks. We just ate a while ago. We'll come back later to eat. Thanks for asking." She and Haxorus stepped to the side as the cashier took someone else's order.

Delia smiled, "You're so polite, Iris. Your mother must be so proud."

Mother? Haxorus wondered. I've never heard about Iris' mother before.

Iris smiled back, "Thank you. Mom says hi by the way. She hopes to see you soon."

Delia smiled. "I hope to see her soon too."

I wonder what Georgia's mother is like. Haxorus thought about it for a moment, and then an image flashed in her mind. Wait, that's Ash's mom. Or Ashley's mom. I want to remember Georgia's mom. Haxorus got more flashes of memory, being raised by a woman looking exactly like Delia.

Delia turned to Haxorus, "Georgia? Are you okay?"

"O-Oh. Just... thinking about my mother," Haxorus replied, distracted.

"I'm sure your mother is proud of you too. I still have that picture your mothers sent us," Ash's mother replied, pointing upwards.

Haxorus looked upwards, on the wall above the counter were pictures of several women, all of whom looked identical to Delia Ketchum, although some groups had different outfits. Haxorus couldn't help but gasp. This must be what the second button did!

Iris raised an eyebrow and asked, "What? Didn't you know about the family of Delias?"

"I, um. Sure!" Lied Haxorus. "I just didn't know it was so big."

Delia Ketchum smiled, "Everytime Ash has found a friend to travel with, they've turned out to have a Delia as one of their parents. Our children are wonderful, and we care for them with all our hearts."

"That's really sweet," Haxorus replied. I wonder if this remote is why there were a lot of Jennys and Joys before. But at least now I know it can do that.

"I'm sorry kids, but I have to get back to work. But I'd love to have you for lunch," Delia Ketchum offered.

Iris nodded, "That sounds great. We'll see you then!"

"Thank you," Delia Ketchum replied.

As Delia Ketchum returned to the restaurant's kitchen, Iris turned to Haxorus and asked, "So what should we do now, Georgia?"

Haxorus thought, and replied-

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
After pressing the body-swap button he had used to get Georgia's body, Haxorus stared at the strange sight before him after he had used the remote on Delia.

What looked like Delia was now standing right next to Ash, but was completely naked. However, she seemed blissfully unaware of that fact, as did Ash, Iris and Cilan.

What appeared to be Pikachu, meanwhile, was walking out of the kitchen holding two trays of sandwiches that seemed too large for his body. He was also wearing a miniature version of Delia's clothes, all fitting his stout body perfectly, even having a section cut out of the skirt so his tail could be seen. Delia's shoes had even be reshaped to be able to perfectly fit his feet.

Delia, now inhabiting the body of Pikachu, set the tray of food on the table, causing Ash to hug him and say, "Thanks, Mom! You're the best!!"

Listening for Delia's response, Haxorus heard him say...

Option 1: Delia talks like a Pikachu and Pikachu talks like a human.

Option 2: Same as above, but everyone understands what Delia is saying while Pikachu is treated like he's talking like Pikachu.

Option 3: Delia still talks like a human, despite her new body, while Pikachu still talks like a Pikachu.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus quickly tapped a button, then put the remote back in her pocket as she stood up to see what the remote did. Ash took a seat at the table, as did Iris and Cilan. Haxorus joined them, and looked up as Delia walked into the room with a plate full of sandwiches. To her surprise, nothing seemed to have happened. That's strange, Haxorus thought. Is the remote broken?

“Here you go,” said Delia Ketchum as she put the plate on the table. “Nothing but the best for my son and her friends.”

“Thanks, Mom,” said Ash Ketchum as he picked up a sandwich and started shoveling it into his mouth.

Iris and Cilan began to eat as well. "Oh wow! These are as good as mom's sandwiches!" She gushed.

Mother? Haxorus wondered. I've never heard about Iris' mother before. I wonder what Georgia's mother is like. Haxorus thought about it for a moment, and then an image flashed in her mind. Wait, that's Ash's mom. I want to remember Georgia's mom. Haxorus got more flashes of memory, being raised by a woman looking exactly like Delia.

Cilan nodded, "As the son of a Delia myself, I can confirm that no finer family of matriarchs can be found."

Delia Ketchum blushed, "That's so kind of you to say, Cilan."

A Delia? Thought Haxorus.

Delia turned to Haxorus, "Georgia? Are you okay?"

"O-Oh. Just... thinking about my mother," Haxorus replied, distracted.

"I'm sure your mother is proud of you too. I still have that picture with your mother and many of the Unovan Delias in one of my scrapbooks," Ash's mother replied.

That was when Haxorus noticed a picture on the wall of several women, all of whom looked identical to Delia Ketchum. Haxorus couldn't help but gasp. This must be what the second button did!

Iris raised an eyebrow and asked, "What? Your mom's a Delia too. She didn't tell you about her family?"

"I, um. Sure!" Lied Haxorus. "I just didn't know it was so big."

Delia Ketchum smiled, "Everytime Ash has found a friend to travel with, they've turned out to have a Delia as one of their parents. Our children are wonderful, and we care for them with all our hearts."

"That's really sweet," Haxorus replied, taking her seat. I wonder if this remote is why there were a lot of Jennys and Joys before. But at least now I know it can do that. Haxorus began eating her sandwiches. "That was great! Thank you!"

"It was my pleasure," Delia Ketchum replied. “Oh, that reminds me. That reporter from Kalos you met, Alexa, I think her name was?”

“Yeah, that’s her,” said Ash. “She went on ahead of us when Iris and Cilan decided to tag along. She made it here alright?”

“Yes, she said she was going to see Professor Oak for an interview,” said Delia. “I think she should be finished by now, if you want to go and visit his lab.”

“Sure!” said Ash. “You guys wanna come and meet all my Pokémon?”

“Yeah,” said Iris. “I can’t wait to see them all.”

“I’ll come too,” said Cilan.

“What about you, Georgia?” Iris asked. “Are you coming?”
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Delia became a family of Delias.

choices: Haxorus turns Alexa into a family of Alexas.
Haxorus does something else with the remote.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus nodded, "I'd love to go with you, Iris!"

Iris smiled, "You're the best, Georgia."

Haxorus, Ash, Iris, and Cilan finished their breakfast and made their way to Professor Oak's Laboratory. On the way there the four of them met up with Alexa.

"Hey, Alexa," Said Ash. "How'd it go?"

Alexa smiled, "It was an honor to interview a great researcher such as Professor Oak. His laboratory is very impressive. As are all of your Pokemon, Ash."

Ash blushed, "Thanks, Alexa. We're going to see them right now."

"What are you going to do now?" Iris asked.

Alexa thought, "I think now would be a good time to go back to the Kalos Region. Have you thought about going there, Ash? I think it'd make a great region to continue your Pokemon Journey.

A new region? With all new people to meet? "We should go, Iris," Haxorus said. "Maybe there will be some cool new Dragon Pokemon there."

Iris paused, "Actually, I was thinking of going to Johto so I could have a battle with Clair. They say she's an incredible Pokemon Trainer."

"And there's an Old Rod Fishing Rally I'm dying to participate in," Added Cilan, flourishing with a fishing pose.

"Oh," Replied Haxorus. "That sounds great too. I'd love to come with you."

"Of course you can come with me, Georgia" Iris replied. "You're my best friend. Why wouldn't I want you along?"

Haxorus smiled, "Thanks, Iris."

"Well, I might want to go to Kalos," Said Ash.

"If you do, I'd be glad to see you around Lumiose City," Said Alexa. "Anyways, I have to go work on the report I'll make based on my interview with Professor Oak. You kids have fun, okay?"

"We will, Alexa," Answered Ash.

Alexa nodded as she and the four children passed each other. As Ash, Iris, and Cilan looked forward, Haxorus looked back at Alexa. Maybe I should use the remote on her, Haxorus wondered.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus decides to go with Ash, Iris and Cilan.

choices: Haxorus decides to stay with Tracey.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
Haxorus quickly pulled out the remote, aimed it at Alexa. She pressed the button, and put the remote back as she saw the flash. She put it back just as Iris called out to her, "Are you okay, Georgia?"

Haxorus nodded, "Yeah, I'm fine," and caught up to the group.

Soon after that, Ash led them up a hill to a large building with a domed roof and a windmill at the back. He led them around the side, following the wooden fence that went on for quite some distance. As they walked along, Haxorus spotted two men in the field on the other side of the fence.

“Professor Oak! Tracey!” Ash yelled, waving as he hopped over the fence. “Hey!”

“Ah, Ash,” said Professor Oak, waving back. “Good to see you again.”

"Hey Ash! Welcome Back!" Said Tracey

“You too, Professor,” said Ash as she walked up to him. "I brought all my friends."

“And who are these friends of yours?” Professor Oak asked as Iris, Cilan and Haxorus all caught up with Ash.

“Oh, right,” said Ash. “This is Iris, Cilan and Georgia, from Unova. Everyone, this is Professor Oak. He’s been looking after all the Pokémon I have when they aren’t with me.”

"It's an honor to meet a professor of such vintage!" Cilan announced. "I am Cilan, Gym Leader of Striaton City."

Professor Oak responded with a friendliness and a little embarrassment, "I'm glad to meet you. I'm no spring chicken, but I still have some years in me."

"You certainly do," Iris said cheekily. "Nice to meet you. My name's Iris, and I'm training to become a Dragon Master"

“Yes, I’m always happy to see Ash's friends, and what new Pokemon Ash catches,” said Professor Oak. “Speaking of which, what Pokemon do you and your friends have with you?”

“Here, we’ll show you,” said Ash, pulling out his Pokeballs. “Come on out, guys!” He threw five Pokeballs into the air, sending out Krookodile, Oshawott, Pignite, Unfezant, and Charizard.

"Here are my Pokemon!" Iris sent out Dragonite, Emolga, Excadrill, and Georgia the Haxorus.

"Come on out, everyone," Said Cilan as he sent out Pansage, Crustle and Stunfisk."

"Here are mine," Added Haxorus, pulling out her own Pokeballs and sending out Beartic, Vanilluxe, Bisharp, Jenny and Joy.

“What an amazing collection of Pokemon!” said Professor Oak. “Your friends are very talented Pokemon Trainers.”

“Thanks, Professor,” said Ash. He then turned to Iris, Cilan and Haxorus. “Come on, I’ll show you around and introduce you to all my other Pokemon.”

"That'd be great!" "Alright!" Iris and Cilan happily joined Ash as Professor Oak led them to where the Pokemon spent their time outside.
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Haxorus turns Alexa into a family of Alexas.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
"Um. I'm a bit tired," Said Haxorus. "Can I rest for a bit, please. I'll join you in a little bit."

Iris paused for a moment, "Oh, no problem, Georgia." Iris rejoined the others, disappearing out the back of Professor Oak's Laboratory.

"Follow me," Said Tracey.

"Okay," Haxorus replied.

Tracey led Haxorus to a couch where they had a seat. "You're Georgia, right? Nice to meet you."

"Yes, nice to meet you too," Haxorus replied. "Do you help Professor Oak here?"

Tracey nodded, "Yes. I help Professor Oak take care of all the Pokemon, and with my training as a Pokemon Watcher I observe the Pokemon and draw them. Speaking of which..." Tracey pulled out a drawing pad, "Mind if I draw you?"

"Uh... draw me?" Haxorus asked.

Tracey nodded, "Yeah. I draw Pokemon and people all the time."

"Which people?" Haxorus asked in response.

"Lots of people, usually the major Pokemon Trainers or Coordinators or what have you in the regions Ash goes to, but there are other people too," Tracey replied.

"Oh. I guess you can draw me," Said Haxorus.

"Thanks, Georgia," Said Tracey, beginning to draw.

"So how'd the interview go?" Haxorus asked.

Tracey replied, "Alexa talked mostly to Professor Oak. It was a pretty standard interview, focusing on the history of the Laboratory, what Professor Oak does, what's been happening recently, that kind of thing." He paused and flipped back a few pages, showing Haxorus his drawing of Alexa, "What do you think?"

"It's amazing," Haxorus said. "It looks just like her." I wonder if the remote would work on drawings like these...

Tracey returned to his drawing replied, "Thanks. She looks just like her cousin from Viridian City. I think Alexa said the two of them were going to meet in Viridian City before she returned to Kalos." He finished his drawing and showed it to Haxorus, asking, "What do you think, Georgia?"

"Do... do you have drawings of anyone else?" Haxorus asked.

"Yeah," Tracey replied. "I can show you my binders, if you want."

Haxorus grinned, "I'd love to see them!"

Tracey led Haxorus to his room. "My binders are all here. The magazines and books I use as reference are here. You can-" Tracey paused.

"What's wrong?" Haxorus asked.

Tracey explained, "I'm sorry, but with the interview going on I almost forgot that it's time to feed the Pokemon! Um, is it okay if I go for a bit?"

"Sure, take all the time you need," Haxorus said.

"Thanks!" Tracey left the room.

Haxorus poured over the drawings and magazines. Wow. I can't wait to get started. She pulled out her remote and got to work.

1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.content:
After pressing the remote, Haxorus saw immediate changes to Delia. She was now dressed in a pink dress with poofy shoulders and a collar that extended halfway down her upper legs. A white apron was draped over the front of the dress, tied in a large bow behind her. White shoes adorned her feet and a pink hat with a red cross sat on her head.

"I wish I could stay longer, but I have to get to the Pokémon Center soon," Delia said after returning Ash's hug.

"Do you really have to Mom? Can't you take a day off being a nurse just this once?"

"Sorry, Ash, but I did take an oath to help any Pokémon I can, and I can't do that while I'm here. Mimey, be a good host to Ash's friends, will you?"

"Mime, Mr. Mime!" Mimey said as he walked outside to greet everyone.

"Alright, there's food on the table in case you need to eat something. Everyone, make yourselves at home; I'll see you after my shift!" Delia called out as she ran into town.

"So she's a nurse at the Pokémon Center?" Haxorus asked, not realizing she said it out loud.

"Yeah, but I wish she didn't have to be there all the time. It's a hassle when I accidentally call the house phone instead of at her work." Ash said as he walked in the house. "Well, you can meet her later; come on in, guys!"

Iris, Cilan and Haxorus all walked into the house. As soon as she entered, Haxorus noticed three photos. One saw many women who looked exactly like Delia standing in a large room smiling as they wore the Nurse outfit. Another had more women who looked like Delia saluting the camera in uniforms like Officer Jenny used to wear. The final photo had a woman who looked like Delia wearing a pink-purple tank top, white pants with a large belt, pink-purple shoes and odd bracelets on her arms posing with a Kadabra.

"Interesting; it looks like the remote made duplicates of Ash's Mom to take the places of all the women I turn into Pokémon. If I use the remote to make another woman a Pokémon again, will Ash's Mom replace that woman, too?"

"You looking at the family photos?" Ash asked, surprising Haxorus. After she calmed down, she replied, "Yeah; it looks like a large, very successful family."

Ash chuckled as he said, "Yeah, well..."
1151222111211121222223312311121221112122.title: Nurse Delia.

choices: "She's the only Delia who was born psychic and decided to become a Gym Leader."

"This isn't even everyone in my family."

Haxorus responded with surprise, "There are more?"

"Of course there are more," Iris replied. "There are Nurse Delias and Officer Delias in Unova too. Are you feeling alright, Georgia?"

"Um... yes," Haxorus answered. "I didn't realize they were all family, though."

Cilan said, "The Delia family line is worldwide, each one dedicated to their job no matter what region they are in."

Haxorus nodded, "I see." She pointed to the picture of the Delia who was posing with a Kadabra, "Why is she by herself?"

Ash answered...

choices: "Yes, and I need to talk to you in private." (About the remote)
